abso: 本实用新型公开一种基于锂电池自愈现象的电池寿命判断装置，包括待测锂电池、电流采样芯片、A/D模数转换器、单片机、液晶显示器和蜂鸣报警器，其特征在于：所述单片机与A/D模数转换器电性连接，所述单片机与电流采样芯片电性连接，所述电流采样芯片与锂电池电性连接，所述液晶显示器和蜂鸣报警器分别与单片机电性连接。为了更好地对电池进行管理，实时对电池寿命进行检测，提高电池的安全性，本实用新型基于锂电池自愈的现象，利用自愈过程前后的电压差值与电池寿命的关系，提出了新的电池寿命判断方法。这种方法可以在线检测电池寿命，且方便和快捷。
tie: A kind of battery life judgment means based on lithium battery self-healing phenomenon
absc: 本实用新型公开一种基于锂电池自愈现象的电池寿命判断装置，包括待测锂电池、电流采样芯片、A/D模数转换器、单片机、液晶显示器和蜂鸣报警器，其特征在于：所述单片机与A/D模数转换器电性连接，所述单片机与电流采样芯片电性连接，所述电流采样芯片与锂电池电性连接，所述液晶显示器和蜂鸣报警器分别与单片机电性连接。为了更好地对电池进行管理，实时对电池寿命进行检测，提高电池的安全性，本实用新型基于锂电池自愈的现象，利用自愈过程前后的电压差值与电池寿命的关系，提出了新的电池寿命判断方法。这种方法可以在线检测电池寿命，且方便和快捷。
abse: The utility model discloses a kind of battery life judgment means based on lithium battery self-healing phenomenon, including lithium battery to be measured, current sample chip, A/D analog-digital converters, microcontroller, liquid crystal display and buzzer siren, it is characterised in that：The microcontroller is electrically connected with A/D analog-digital converters, and the microcontroller is electrically connected with current sample chip, and the current sample chip is electrically connected with lithium battery, and the liquid crystal display and buzzer siren are electrically connected respectively with microcontroller.In order to be preferably managed to battery, battery life is detected in real time, improves the safety of battery, the phenomenon that the utility model is based on lithium battery self-healing, utilize the voltage difference and the relationship of battery life before and after self-healing procedure, it is proposed that new battery life judgment method.This method can be with on-line checking battery life, and conveniently and fast.

abso: 本实用新型公开一种传感器故障诊断装置，用于工业机器人，包括电源模块、传感器模块、逻辑控制模块、14位A/D转换器、ARM处理器、状态显示模块和故障类型匹配模块，所述电源模块分别与传感器模块、逻辑控制模块、14位A/D转换器、ARM处理器和状态显示模块连接，所述传感器模块、逻辑控制模块、14位A/D转换器、ARM处理器和状态显示模块依次连接，所述故障类型匹配模块分别与ARM处理器和状态显示模块连接；该传感器故障诊断装置实现了对于工业机器人传感器的故障诊断与类型识别。
tie: A kind of sensor malfunction diagnostic device
absc: 本实用新型公开一种传感器故障诊断装置，用于工业机器人，包括电源模块、传感器模块、逻辑控制模块、14位A/D转换器、ARM处理器、状态显示模块和故障类型匹配模块，所述电源模块分别与传感器模块、逻辑控制模块、14位A/D转换器、ARM处理器和状态显示模块连接，所述传感器模块、逻辑控制模块、14位A/D转换器、ARM处理器和状态显示模块依次连接，所述故障类型匹配模块分别与ARM处理器和状态显示模块连接；该传感器故障诊断装置实现了对于工业机器人传感器的故障诊断与类型识别。
abse: The open a kind of sensor malfunction diagnostic device of this utility model, for industrial robot, including power module, sensor assembly, Logic control module, 14 A/D converters, arm processor, state display module and fault type matching module, described power module respectively with sensor assembly, Logic control module, 14 A/D converters, arm processor and state display module connect, described sensor assembly, Logic control module, 14 A/D converters, arm processor and state display module are sequentially connected with, described fault type matching module is connected with arm processor and state display module respectively；This sensor malfunction diagnostic device achieves the fault diagnosis for industrial robot sensor and type identification.

abso: 本发明提供一种铜‑二氧化钛‑介孔二氧化硅微球复合材料，其是将Cu掺杂在负载二氧化钛的介孔二氧化硅球上。本发明还提供所述铜‑二氧化钛‑介孔二氧化硅微球复合材料的制备方法。本发明提出的铜‑二氧化钛‑介孔二氧化硅微球复合材料无污染、可回收、成本低；本发明提出的复合材料中含铜，降低了二氧化钛带隙能，提高了可见光利用率，可见光下对亚甲基蓝的降解率达到99％以上，使其应用于染料废水降解时成本更低，更具商业价值。
tie: Copper-titanium dioxide-mesoporous silicon dioxide micro-sphere composite material
absc: 本发明提供一种铜‑二氧化钛‑介孔二氧化硅微球复合材料，其是将Cu掺杂在负载二氧化钛的介孔二氧化硅球上。本发明还提供所述铜‑二氧化钛‑介孔二氧化硅微球复合材料的制备方法。本发明提出的铜‑二氧化钛‑介孔二氧化硅微球复合材料无污染、可回收、成本低；本发明提出的复合材料中含铜，降低了二氧化钛带隙能，提高了可见光利用率，可见光下对亚甲基蓝的降解率达到99％以上，使其应用于染料废水降解时成本更低，更具商业价值。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of copper-titanium dioxide-mesoporous silicon dioxide micro-sphere composite material, is that Cu is entrained on the mesoporous silica spheres of carried titanium dioxide.The present invention also provides the preparation methods of the copper-titanium dioxide-mesoporous silicon dioxide micro-sphere composite material.Mesoporous silicon dioxide micro-sphere composite material is pollution-free, recyclable, at low cost for copper-titanium dioxide-proposed by the present invention；Cupric in composite material proposed by the present invention reduces titanium dioxide band-gap energy, improves visible light utilization efficiency, it is seen that reaches 99% or more to the degradation rate of methylene blue under light, cost is lower when it being made to be applied to dye wastewater degradation, more commercial value.

abso: 本发明提供了一种问答匹配方法及装置，涉及智能问答技术领域，包括一种问答匹配方法，包括：提取输入问句文本中的关键词；根据关键词，采用索引过滤的方式从预先建立的问题库中确定目标匹配问句文本；基于莱温斯坦距离算法，从目标匹配问句文本中确定与输入问句文本的相似度最高的最佳匹配问句文本；根据最佳匹配问句文本，输出与输入问句文本对应的答案文本。本发明可以在较短的时间内输出与输入问句相应的答案，既可缩短问答匹配时长，又可提升准确率。
tie: Method and device for matching between questions and answers
absc: 本发明提供了一种问答匹配方法及装置，涉及智能问答技术领域，包括一种问答匹配方法，包括：提取输入问句文本中的关键词；根据关键词，采用索引过滤的方式从预先建立的问题库中确定目标匹配问句文本；基于莱温斯坦距离算法，从目标匹配问句文本中确定与输入问句文本的相似度最高的最佳匹配问句文本；根据最佳匹配问句文本，输出与输入问句文本对应的答案文本。本发明可以在较短的时间内输出与输入问句相应的答案，既可缩短问答匹配时长，又可提升准确率。
abse: The invention provides a method and a device for matching between questions and answers and relates to the technical field of intelligent questions and answers. The method for matching between questions and answers include extracting keywords input into a question text, determining a target matching question text from a pre-built question base by an index filtering method according to the keywords, determining the optimum matching question text with highest similarity with the input question text from the target matching question text on the basis of the Levenshtein distance algorithm, and outputting an answer text corresponding to the input question text according to the optimum matching question text. By the method and the device, answers matched with questions can be outputted and inputted within a short time, thus, time for matching between the question and the answer can be shortened while matching accuracy can be improved.

abso: 本发明涉及一种从三维牙科锥形束CT数据中提取全景图的方法，步骤如下：⑴根据三维牙科锥形束CT数据生成牙弓曲线；⑵根据生成牙弓曲线提取三维口腔全景曲面；⑶展开三维口腔全景曲面得到口腔全景图。本方法可以用三维CT数据提取牙齿曲面断层图像，解决结构重叠和图像模糊的问题，提高了诊断的精度；利用该方法，可以得到单帧口腔全景图，而且该方法得到的单帧口腔全景图能够显示全口齿列，能清晰地辨识出牙齿的解剖结构，如：牙釉质、牙本质、牙髓等，有效地避免了由透视引起的图像模糊，无结构重叠。
tie: Method for extracting panoramic image from three-dimensional conical beam CT data of dentistry department
absc: 本发明涉及一种从三维牙科锥形束CT数据中提取全景图的方法，步骤如下：⑴根据三维牙科锥形束CT数据生成牙弓曲线；⑵根据生成牙弓曲线提取三维口腔全景曲面；⑶展开三维口腔全景曲面得到口腔全景图。本方法可以用三维CT数据提取牙齿曲面断层图像，解决结构重叠和图像模糊的问题，提高了诊断的精度；利用该方法，可以得到单帧口腔全景图，而且该方法得到的单帧口腔全景图能够显示全口齿列，能清晰地辨识出牙齿的解剖结构，如：牙釉质、牙本质、牙髓等，有效地避免了由透视引起的图像模糊，无结构重叠。
abse: The invention relates to a method for extracting panoramic image from three-dimensional conical beam CT data of a dentistry department, and the method comprises the following steps: (1), generating a dental arch curve according to the three-dimensional conical beam CT data of the dentistry department; (2), extracting a three-dimensional oral cavity panoramic curved surface according to the generated dental arch curve; (3), expanding the three-dimensional oral cavity panoramic curved surface and obtaining an oral cavity panoramic image. The method can extract a tooth curved surface faultage image through the three-dimensional CT data, solves problems of structure overlapping and image fuzzy, and improves the diagnosis precision. The method can obtain a single-frame oral cavity panoramic image, and the single-frame oral cavity panoramic image can display all teeth. The method can clearly recognize the anatomical structure of teeth, such as enamel, dentin and dental pulp, effectively avoids image fuzzy caused by perspective, and has no structure overlapping.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于车载网络的交通事故消息分发方法，包括以下步骤：发生交通事故后，搜索事故车辆附近的第一目标车辆的第一行驶信息，其中，第一行驶信息包括第一目标车辆的行驶速度、第一目标车辆的行驶方向和第一目标车辆与事故车辆的距离；根据事故车辆的通信距离、事故车辆的事故消息传输时间和第一行驶信息判断并认定第一目标车辆是否为原始中继车辆；若第一目标车辆为原始中继车辆，事故车辆向原始中继车辆发送事故信息；原始中继车辆转发事故信息。本发明具有如下优点：在数据请求量庞大、交通流量繁忙的城市交通网络中让安全信息快速的传输，让即将到达事故现场的车辆提前知晓前方路况，从而及时做出反应，避免交通状况进一步恶化。
tie: Traffic accident message transmission method based on vehicle-mounted network
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于车载网络的交通事故消息分发方法，包括以下步骤：发生交通事故后，搜索事故车辆附近的第一目标车辆的第一行驶信息，其中，第一行驶信息包括第一目标车辆的行驶速度、第一目标车辆的行驶方向和第一目标车辆与事故车辆的距离；根据事故车辆的通信距离、事故车辆的事故消息传输时间和第一行驶信息判断并认定第一目标车辆是否为原始中继车辆；若第一目标车辆为原始中继车辆，事故车辆向原始中继车辆发送事故信息；原始中继车辆转发事故信息。本发明具有如下优点：在数据请求量庞大、交通流量繁忙的城市交通网络中让安全信息快速的传输，让即将到达事故现场的车辆提前知晓前方路况，从而及时做出反应，避免交通状况进一步恶化。
abse: The invention discloses a traffic accident message transmission method based on a vehicle-mounted network, and the method comprises the following steps: searching first driving information of a first target vehicle nearby an accident vehicle after a traffic accident happens, wherein the first driving information comprises the driving speed of the first target vehicle, the driving direction of the first target vehicle, and a distance from the first target vehicle to the accident vehicle; judging and determining whether the first target vehicle is an original relay vehicle or not according to the communication distance of the accident vehicle, accident message transmission time of the accident vehicle and the first driving information; enabling the accident vehicle to transmit the accident information to the original relay vehicle if the first target vehicle is the original relay vehicle; and enabling the original relay vehicle to transmit the accident information. The method is advantageous in that the method enables the safety information to be quickly transmitted in an urban traffic network which is large in data request amount and is busy in traffic, reminds a vehicle, which is about to arrive an accident scene, of the front road conditions in advance, enables the vehicle to make timely response, and prevents the traffic condition from becoming worse.

abso: 本实用新型属于虚拟显示设备技术领域，尤其为一种虚拟现实头戴显示器防绕线装置，包括升降支架，所述升降支架的顶部设有连接轴承，连接轴承上设有导轨杆，导轨杆上滑动套设有多个引线环，且导轨杆上滑动安装有滑环托盘，导轨杆的底部固定安装有安装块，安装块的底部开设有第一凹槽，第一凹槽内滑动安装有滑杆，滑杆的底端延伸至第一凹槽外，且滑杆上开设有导向通孔，滑杆、多个引线环和滑环托盘上设有同一个线缆。本实用新型结构简单，操作方便，通过电机提供动力就能快速的对线缆进行线性减速刹车，从而避免了线缆伸出过长拉扯设备插头，有效的保护了设备和线缆，便于人们使用。
tie: A kind of virtual reality head-mounted display anti-winding device

abse: The utility model belongs to virtual display device technical field, in particular a kind of virtual reality head-mounted display anti-winding device, including lifting support, the top of the lifting support is equipped with connection bearing, it connects bearing and is equipped with guide rail pole, sliding sleeve is equipped with multiple feed-through collars on guide rail pole, and slip ring pallet is slidably fitted on guide rail pole, the bottom of guide rail pole is fixedly installed with mounting blocks, the bottom of mounting blocks offers the first groove, slide bar is slidably fitted in first groove, the bottom end of slide bar extends to outside the first groove, and guide through hole is offered on slide bar, slide bar, multiple feed-through collars and slip ring pallet are equipped with the same cable.The utility model structure is simple, easy to operate, and providing power by motor quickly can carry out linear slowing-down brake to cable, pulls equipment plug so as to avoid cable stretching is too long, effectively protects equipment and cable, use convenient for people.

abso: 本发明提供了一种机器人表情控制方法和装置。其中，该方法包括接收机器人采集的用户行为信号；其中，该用户行为信号包括面部反射信号、肢体反射信号和声音信号中的一种或多种；从用户行为信号中提取用户情绪特征；其中，用户情绪特征包括表情特征、动作特征和声音特征中的一种或多种；从预先建立的表情参数数据库中查找与用户情绪特征对应的表情参数；将表情参数发送至机器人，以使机器人从预先建立的表情表达数据库中查找与表情参数对应的表情表达数据；根据表情表达数据控制机器人面部进行表情展示；其中，表情表达数据包括人脸面部五官的动作控制数据。本发明增强了机器人与用户的互动性和实用性，进而提高了用户的体验度。
tie: Robot expression control method and device
absc: 本发明提供了一种机器人表情控制方法和装置。其中，该方法包括接收机器人采集的用户行为信号；其中，该用户行为信号包括面部反射信号、肢体反射信号和声音信号中的一种或多种；从用户行为信号中提取用户情绪特征；其中，用户情绪特征包括表情特征、动作特征和声音特征中的一种或多种；从预先建立的表情参数数据库中查找与用户情绪特征对应的表情参数；将表情参数发送至机器人，以使机器人从预先建立的表情表达数据库中查找与表情参数对应的表情表达数据；根据表情表达数据控制机器人面部进行表情展示；其中，表情表达数据包括人脸面部五官的动作控制数据。本发明增强了机器人与用户的互动性和实用性，进而提高了用户的体验度。
abse: The invention provides a kind of robot expression control method and device.Wherein, this method includes receiving the user behavior signal of robot collection；Wherein, the user behavior signal includes the one or more in facial reflected signal, limbs reflected signal and voice signal；User emotion feature is extracted from user behavior signal；Wherein, user emotion feature includes the one or more in expressive features, motion characteristic and sound characteristic；Expression parameter corresponding with user emotion feature is searched from the expression parameter database pre-established；Expression parameter is sent to robot, so that expression expression data corresponding with expression parameter are searched from the expression expression database pre-established by robot；Data control machine human face is expressed according to expression and carries out expression displaying；Wherein, expression expression data include the action control data of face face face.Invention enhances robot and the interactive and practicality of user, and then improve the Experience Degree of user.

abso: 本发明涉及乙醇的生物制备领域，具体地涉及三阶段基因转录调控提高纤维素乙醇产量的方法及基因工程菌株。所述方法包括通过构建基因XR、XDH、XK、RPE1、RKI1和TAL1的表达质粒，在酿酒酵母中表达上述基因的步骤，其中，用KGD1启动子介导限速基因XK，用HSP26启动子介导关键限速基因TAL1。本发明将纤维素酒精发酵过程分为厌氧的葡萄糖发酵阶段，好氧的木糖呼吸代谢阶段，具有热休克特征的高温抑制为主的发酵后期阶段，共三个阶段。让目标基因在三个阶段的每一个阶段都能得到高效的表达，从而让纤维素底物更加高效地转化为纤维素乙醇。
tie: Three-stage genetic transcription control method for improving cellulosic ethanol yield and genetic engineering bacterial strain
absc: 本发明涉及乙醇的生物制备领域，具体地涉及三阶段基因转录调控提高纤维素乙醇产量的方法及基因工程菌株。所述方法包括通过构建基因XR、XDH、XK、RPE1、RKI1和TAL1的表达质粒，在酿酒酵母中表达上述基因的步骤，其中，用KGD1启动子介导限速基因XK，用HSP26启动子介导关键限速基因TAL1。本发明将纤维素酒精发酵过程分为厌氧的葡萄糖发酵阶段，好氧的木糖呼吸代谢阶段，具有热休克特征的高温抑制为主的发酵后期阶段，共三个阶段。让目标基因在三个阶段的每一个阶段都能得到高效的表达，从而让纤维素底物更加高效地转化为纤维素乙醇。
abse: The invention relates to the field of biology preparation of ethanol, in particular to a three-stage genetic transcription control method for improving cellulosic ethanol yield and genetic engineering bacterial strain. The method comprises a step of expressing genes of XR, XDH, XK, RPE1, RKI1 and TAL1 in saccharomyces cerevisiae by building of expression plasmids of the genes of XR, XDH, XK, RPE1, RKI1 AND TAL1, wherein KGD1 is used for starting sub-mediation rate-limiting gene XK, and HSP26 is used for starting sub-mediation key rate-limiting gene TAL1. The cellulose alcoholic fermentation process is divided into three stages including an anaerobic glucose ferment stage, an aerobic xylose respiratory metabolism stage and a ferment later stage period which has a heat shock characteristic and gives priority to high temperature restraint. A target gene is enabled to be high efficiently expressed in each stage so that cellulose zymolyte can be high efficiently transferred to cellulosic ethanol.

abso: 本发明公开一种降低同步开销的数据写入方法及装置，所述方法包括：获取外部写入的数据；将数据拷贝到日志区中进行备份；确定所述数据对应的缓存页；按照所述数据所在缓存页的缓存模式持久化所述数据，本发明根据数据写入的频繁程度，对其采取不同的缓存模式，写入频繁的数据只将其存储在缓存区Cache中，减少了写入片外存储器的同步开销，而且，备份日志存储在片上的便笺式存储器SPM，无需再写到片外的存储器中，进一步减少了同步开销。
tie: Data writing method and apparatus for reducing synchronization overheads
absc: 本发明公开一种降低同步开销的数据写入方法及装置，所述方法包括：获取外部写入的数据；将数据拷贝到日志区中进行备份；确定所述数据对应的缓存页；按照所述数据所在缓存页的缓存模式持久化所述数据，本发明根据数据写入的频繁程度，对其采取不同的缓存模式，写入频繁的数据只将其存储在缓存区Cache中，减少了写入片外存储器的同步开销，而且，备份日志存储在片上的便笺式存储器SPM，无需再写到片外的存储器中，进一步减少了同步开销。
abse: The invention discloses a data writing method and an apparatus for reducing synchronization overheads. The method comprises: acquiring data written from outside; copying the data to a log region for backup; determining cached pages corresponding to the data; in according with the cache mode of the cached page where the data are, making the data persistent. The method and apparatus of the invention, in accordance with frequency of data writing, adopt different cache modes, and merely store frequently written data to a Cache region, and reduces synchronization overheads written to an off-chip memory. And a scratch pad memory (SPM) which stores backup log to the chip without having to writing to the off-chip memory, which further reduces synchronization overheads.

abso: 本发明公开了一种阶梯式检测过氧化氢溶液浓度的方法，包括如下步骤：1)用与过氧化氢反应的光热转换材料修饰含有稀土元素的纳米材料，得到功能化稀土纳米材料；2)分别用一系列标准浓度的过氧化氢溶液与所述功能化稀土纳米材料进行反应，得到一系列混合液，并分别测其发光强度、紫外‑可见吸光强度、光热升温温度，分别做发光强度、紫外吸光强度、升温温度与浓度的标准曲线；3)将未知浓度的待测过氧化氢溶液与所述功能化稀土纳米材料进行反应，得到混合液，确定检测模式，测定相应的数据，与所述标准曲线对比，即得知浓度。有效的降低检测限，同时提升了线性检测范围。材料简单，仪器价格低廉，可用于食品、药品和活体样品等样品的检测。
tie: A kind of method of staircase test hydrogenperoxide steam generator concentration
absc: 本发明公开了一种阶梯式检测过氧化氢溶液浓度的方法，包括如下步骤：1)用与过氧化氢反应的光热转换材料修饰含有稀土元素的纳米材料，得到功能化稀土纳米材料；2)分别用一系列标准浓度的过氧化氢溶液与所述功能化稀土纳米材料进行反应，得到一系列混合液，并分别测其发光强度、紫外‑可见吸光强度、光热升温温度，分别做发光强度、紫外吸光强度、升温温度与浓度的标准曲线；3)将未知浓度的待测过氧化氢溶液与所述功能化稀土纳米材料进行反应，得到混合液，确定检测模式，测定相应的数据，与所述标准曲线对比，即得知浓度。有效的降低检测限，同时提升了线性检测范围。材料简单，仪器价格低廉，可用于食品、药品和活体样品等样品的检测。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of method of staircase test hydrogenperoxide steam generator concentration, includes the following steps: 1) to modify the nano material containing rare earth element with the optical-thermal conversion material of hydroperoxidation, obtain functional rare earth nano-material；2) it is reacted respectively with the hydrogenperoxide steam generator of series of standards concentration with the functional rare earth nano-material, obtain a series of mixed liquors, and survey its luminous intensity, ultraviolet-visible photon absorbing intensity, photo-thermal warming temperature respectively, do respectively luminous intensity, ultraviolet light absorption intensity, warming temperature and concentration standard curve；3) hydrogenperoxide steam generator to be measured of unknown concentration is reacted with the functional rare earth nano-material, obtains mixed liquor, determine detection pattern, measure corresponding data, compared with the standard curve to get concentration is known.Detection limit is effectively reduced, while improving linear detection range.Material is simple, and instrument price is cheap, can be used for the detection of the samples such as food, drug and biopsy samples.

abso: 本发明公开了一种区域地面沉降时空预测方法，包括：S1、结合雷达影像数据，通过雷达数据处理软件获取地面沉降信息，通过现场实测GPS与水准测量数据对地面沉降数据进行精度验证，获取高精度地面沉降信息数据库；S2、通过改进的灰色模型对地面沉降进行模拟与预测；S3‑S4、通过SOM聚类算法对监测值与模拟值的比值与误差进行聚类获取马尔科夫区间并求取马尔科夫矩阵，然后通过改进的马尔科夫模型对灰色模型预测值进行改进，通过对InSAR进行大尺度地面沉降预测。本发明通过对InSAR进行大尺度的地面预测减少对人工的依赖，节约工程成本。
tie: A kind of regional land subsidence spatio-temporal prediction method
absc: 本发明公开了一种区域地面沉降时空预测方法，包括：S1、结合雷达影像数据，通过雷达数据处理软件获取地面沉降信息，通过现场实测GPS与水准测量数据对地面沉降数据进行精度验证，获取高精度地面沉降信息数据库；S2、通过改进的灰色模型对地面沉降进行模拟与预测；S3‑S4、通过SOM聚类算法对监测值与模拟值的比值与误差进行聚类获取马尔科夫区间并求取马尔科夫矩阵，然后通过改进的马尔科夫模型对灰色模型预测值进行改进，通过对InSAR进行大尺度地面沉降预测。本发明通过对InSAR进行大尺度的地面预测减少对人工的依赖，节约工程成本。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of regional land subsidence spatio-temporal prediction method, including：S1, with reference to radar image data, software is handled by radar data and obtains surface subsidence information, precision test is carried out to ground settling data by field measurement GPS and measurement of the level data, Ground Nuclear Magnetic Resonance sedimentation information database is obtained；S2, by Improved Gray Model surface subsidence is simulated and predicted；S3 S4, cluster is carried out by SOM clustering algorithms to monitor value and the ratio and error of the analogue value, and to obtain Markov interval and ask for Markov matrix, then Grey Model value is improved by improved Markov model, by carrying out large scale surface subsidence prediction to InSAR.Ground prediction of the present invention by carrying out large scale to InSAR is reduced to artificial dependence, saves engineering cost.

abso: 本发明涉及一种自聚焦光束发生器及其设计方法。该自聚焦光束发生器的设计方法包括：给定一束线偏振光，创建天线数据库；对预期的环形艾里光束传播初始平面的电场的振幅和相位分别进行量化，得到多个量化的第一振幅和多个量化的第一相位；从天线数据库中选择出多个能产生第一振幅和第一相位的天线结构；利用多个天线结构组成二维天线阵列；由基底和具有二维天线阵列的金属膜组成自聚焦光束发生器。本发明实施例的自聚焦光束发生器的设计方法，设计出的自聚焦光束发生器可以实现全波段的光束自聚焦效应，对产生的正交偏振散射光的振幅和相位同时调制，填补了红外波段、太赫兹波段、以及微波波段产生自聚焦光束的空白。
tie: Self focusing light beam generator and its design method
absc: 本发明涉及一种自聚焦光束发生器及其设计方法。该自聚焦光束发生器的设计方法包括：给定一束线偏振光，创建天线数据库；对预期的环形艾里光束传播初始平面的电场的振幅和相位分别进行量化，得到多个量化的第一振幅和多个量化的第一相位；从天线数据库中选择出多个能产生第一振幅和第一相位的天线结构；利用多个天线结构组成二维天线阵列；由基底和具有二维天线阵列的金属膜组成自聚焦光束发生器。本发明实施例的自聚焦光束发生器的设计方法，设计出的自聚焦光束发生器可以实现全波段的光束自聚焦效应，对产生的正交偏振散射光的振幅和相位同时调制，填补了红外波段、太赫兹波段、以及微波波段产生自聚焦光束的空白。
abse: The present invention relates to a kind of self focusing light beam generator and its design methods.The design method of the self focusing light beam generator includes: to give a branch of linearly polarized light, creates antenna database；The amplitude of the electric field of initial plane is propagated to expected annular Airy beam and phase quantifies respectively, obtains the first amplitude of multiple quantizations and the first phase of multiple quantizations；Multiple antenna structures that can generate the first amplitude and first phase are selected from antenna database；Utilize mutiple antennas structure composition two-dimensional antenna array；Self focusing light beam generator is formed by substrate and the metal film with two-dimensional antenna array.The design method of the self focusing light beam generator of the embodiment of the present invention, full wave light beam self-focusing effect may be implemented in the self focusing light beam generator designed, the amplitude and phase of the cross-polarization scattering light of generation are modulated simultaneously, filled up the blank that infrared band, terahertz wave band and microwave band generate self-trapped optical beam.

abso: 本发明提供一种基于纳米金‑DNA复合材料检测蛋白质的方法，包括纳米金‑DNA复合物的制备、纳米金‑DNA‑蛋白质三元复合物的生成、纳米金催化硝基苯酚和硼氢化钠反应(显色体系)、目测反应液由黄色变成无色的时间(CCT值)、根据不同蛋白质的CCT/CCT<Sub>0</Sub>值绘制LDA图，以及将已知浓度的待测蛋白质加入上述显色体系，计算待测蛋白质的CCT/CCT<Sub>0</Sub>值，结合LDA图从而对待测蛋白质进行识别。本发明建立在线性判别分析技术的基础上，仅需通过肉眼观察，并用计时器记录溶液颜色变化的时间，无需借助任何昂贵的仪器，即可成功识别出不同蛋白质，检测限达到30nM，为蛋白质高通量快速检测提供新的技术手段。
tie: Method of protein is detected based on nanogold DNA composites
absc: 本发明提供一种基于纳米金‑DNA复合材料检测蛋白质的方法，包括纳米金‑DNA复合物的制备、纳米金‑DNA‑蛋白质三元复合物的生成、纳米金催化硝基苯酚和硼氢化钠反应(显色体系)、目测反应液由黄色变成无色的时间(CCT值)、根据不同蛋白质的CCT/CCT<Sub>0</Sub>值绘制LDA图，以及将已知浓度的待测蛋白质加入上述显色体系，计算待测蛋白质的CCT/CCT<Sub>0</Sub>值，结合LDA图从而对待测蛋白质进行识别。本发明建立在线性判别分析技术的基础上，仅需通过肉眼观察，并用计时器记录溶液颜色变化的时间，无需借助任何昂贵的仪器，即可成功识别出不同蛋白质，检测限达到30nM，为蛋白质高通量快速检测提供新的技术手段。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of based on nanogold DNA composites detection method of protein, including the preparation of nanogold DNA compounds, the generation of nanogold DNA protein ternary complexs, nano gold catalysis nitrophenol and sodium borohydride reaction (color development system), range estimation reaction solution become colourless time (CCT values), according to the CCT/CCT of different proteins by yellow<Sub>0</Sub>Value draws LDA figures, and the testing protein of concentration known is added into above-mentioned color development system, calculates the CCT/CCT of testing protein<Sub>0</Sub>Value, scheme with reference to LDA so as to which testing protein be identified.The present invention is established on the basis of linear discriminant analysis technology, only need to observe by the naked eye, and with the time of timer recording solution color change, without any expensive instrument, different proteins can successfully be identified, test limit reaches 30nM, and new technological means is provided for protein high flux quick detection.

abso: 本发明提出一种基于多分辨率奇异值分解和混沌序列的图像加密方法，包括：对载体图像进行多分辨率奇异值分解；使用混沌序列对秘密图像进行置乱操作；将置乱后的秘密图像分解为第一子图像和第二子图像；分别将第一子图像和第二子图像作为载体图像第一方向和第二方向的细节成分，进行多分辨率奇异值分解的逆变换，以得到包含秘密图像的载体图像。本发明的加密方法使用多分辨率奇异值分解而增加了密钥空间，从而有效提升加密的安全性和可靠性，适于在保密通信中使用。
tie: Image encryption method based on multiresolution singular value decomposition and chaos sequence
absc: 本发明提出一种基于多分辨率奇异值分解和混沌序列的图像加密方法，包括：对载体图像进行多分辨率奇异值分解；使用混沌序列对秘密图像进行置乱操作；将置乱后的秘密图像分解为第一子图像和第二子图像；分别将第一子图像和第二子图像作为载体图像第一方向和第二方向的细节成分，进行多分辨率奇异值分解的逆变换，以得到包含秘密图像的载体图像。本发明的加密方法使用多分辨率奇异值分解而增加了密钥空间，从而有效提升加密的安全性和可靠性，适于在保密通信中使用。
abse: The present invention proposes a kind of image encryption method based on multiresolution singular value decomposition and chaos sequence, comprising: carries out multiresolution singular value decomposition to carrier image；Shuffle operation is carried out to Secret Image using chaos sequence；Secret Image after scramble is decomposed into the first subgraph and the second subgraph；Respectively using the first subgraph and the second subgraph as the details ingredient of carrier image first direction and second direction, the inverse transformation of multiresolution singular value decomposition is carried out, to obtain the carrier image comprising Secret Image.Encryption method of the invention increases key space using multiresolution singular value decomposition, so that the safety and reliability of encryption is effectively promoted, suitable for using in secret communication.

abso: 本发明公开了一种电源功率模块劣化状态在线判方法，包括：在功率模块的驱动端加载或撤销驱动信号时，采集该功率模块的输出端的输出信号和驱动端的驱动信号；根据该驱动端的驱动信号建立输出端的输出信号的Volterra时域模型，并计算该Volterra时域模型的时域核值；以及将时域核值与预定的正常值进行比较，根据比较结果判断该功率模块的劣化状态。由于，本发明方法不需要外加激励而是利用自身驱动信号作为激励输入信号，通过辨识Volterra级数的时域核值的大小来判断该功率模块的劣化状态，因此，本发明方法利用自身信号对功率模块的劣化状态进行判断，从而提高功率模块劣化状态判断的可靠性和准确性。
tie: Online judging method for degradation state of power module
absc: 本发明公开了一种电源功率模块劣化状态在线判方法，包括：在功率模块的驱动端加载或撤销驱动信号时，采集该功率模块的输出端的输出信号和驱动端的驱动信号；根据该驱动端的驱动信号建立输出端的输出信号的Volterra时域模型，并计算该Volterra时域模型的时域核值；以及将时域核值与预定的正常值进行比较，根据比较结果判断该功率模块的劣化状态。由于，本发明方法不需要外加激励而是利用自身驱动信号作为激励输入信号，通过辨识Volterra级数的时域核值的大小来判断该功率模块的劣化状态，因此，本发明方法利用自身信号对功率模块的劣化状态进行判断，从而提高功率模块劣化状态判断的可靠性和准确性。
abse: The invention discloses an online judging method for a degradation state of a power module. The online judging method includes that when a driving signal is loaded or withdrawn from a driving end of the power module, an output signal of the output end and the driving signal of the driving end of the power module are collected; a Volterra time domain model of the output signal of the output end is built according to the driving signal of the driving end, and time domain core value of the Volterra time domain model is calculated; and the time domain core value is compared with a preset normal value, the degradation state of the power module is judged according to a comparison result. Due to the fact that external excitation is not required and a self driving signal is used as an excitation input signal, the degradation state of the power module is judged by identifying the time domain core value of a Volterra level. The self driving signal is used for judging the degradation state of the power module, and reliability and accuracy for judging the degradation state of the power module are improved.

abso: 本发明公开了一种可对pH值发生响应的上转换纳米材料及其制备方法。该方法首先合成pH敏感高分子材料，然后与油酸保护上转换纳米颗粒通过配体交换制备得到。本发明以上转换纳米材料为基材，通过与聚三级胺类pH响应聚合物复合，实现了反斯托克斯位移光学材料的pH响应性能。该材料在低pH水溶液中，在近红外激光激发下，纳米材料发光较弱，在高于特定pH值后，纳米材料相对于低pH值光强可增强20倍，且pH转换区间仅为0.3个pH区间，及水溶液中质子浓度近发生2倍的变化即可使得上转换纳米材料光强增强20倍。本发明制备得到的智能响应上转换纳米材料具有良好的水溶性，光学信号强，低毒性，以及对环境pH值的灵敏响应性能。
tie: It is a kind of can be to up-conversion nano material that pH value responds and preparation method thereof
absc: 本发明公开了一种可对pH值发生响应的上转换纳米材料及其制备方法。该方法首先合成pH敏感高分子材料，然后与油酸保护上转换纳米颗粒通过配体交换制备得到。本发明以上转换纳米材料为基材，通过与聚三级胺类pH响应聚合物复合，实现了反斯托克斯位移光学材料的pH响应性能。该材料在低pH水溶液中，在近红外激光激发下，纳米材料发光较弱，在高于特定pH值后，纳米材料相对于低pH值光强可增强20倍，且pH转换区间仅为0.3个pH区间，及水溶液中质子浓度近发生2倍的变化即可使得上转换纳米材料光强增强20倍。本发明制备得到的智能响应上转换纳米材料具有良好的水溶性，光学信号强，低毒性，以及对环境pH值的灵敏响应性能。
abse: The invention discloses it is a kind of can be to up-conversion nano material that pH value responds and preparation method thereof.This method synthesizes pH sensitive high molecular weight materials first, then upper conversion nano particle is protected to be prepared by ligand exchange with oleic acid.The present invention is using up-conversion nano material as base material, by compound with poly- three-level amine pH responsive polymers, realizes the pH response performances of anti-Stokes displacement optical material.The material is in low pH aqueous solutions, under near-infrared laser excitation, nano material shines weaker, after higher than certain ph, nano material can enhance 20 times relative to low ph value light intensity, and pH converts the variation that section is only proton concentration closely 2 times of generation in 0.3 pH section and aqueous solution and may be such that up-conversion nano material light intensity enhances 20 times.The intelligent response up-conversion nano material that the present invention is prepared has good water solubility, and optical signalling is strong, hypotoxicity and the sensitive response performance to environmental pH.

abso: 本发明公开了一种检测表皮生长因子的电化学免疫传感器及其制备方法。该传感器由下至上依次由玻碳电极、修饰层a、修饰层b和修饰层c组成；其中，修饰层a为由式Ia或式Ib所示聚多巴胺构成的膜：式Ia和式Ib中，n均为1000-15000；修饰层b由表皮生长因子和谷胱甘肽构成，且所述表皮生长因子和谷胱甘肽均粘附于所述修饰层a上；修饰层c由表皮生长因子抗体修饰的纳米银溶胶制得。本发明通过表皮生长因子与其抗体的特异免疫识别反应，可构筑检测表皮生长因子的电化学免疫传感器。该传感器灵敏度良好、线性范围较宽，检出限低达0.2nmol/L，并有望用于实际样品中表皮生长因子的检测。式Ia式Ib。
tie: Electrochemical immunosensor for detecting epidermal growth factor (EGF), and preparation method of electrochemical immunosensor
absc: 本发明公开了一种检测表皮生长因子的电化学免疫传感器及其制备方法。该传感器由下至上依次由玻碳电极、修饰层a、修饰层b和修饰层c组成；其中，修饰层a为由式Ia或式Ib所示聚多巴胺构成的膜：式Ia和式Ib中，n均为1000-15000；修饰层b由表皮生长因子和谷胱甘肽构成，且所述表皮生长因子和谷胱甘肽均粘附于所述修饰层a上；修饰层c由表皮生长因子抗体修饰的纳米银溶胶制得。本发明通过表皮生长因子与其抗体的特异免疫识别反应，可构筑检测表皮生长因子的电化学免疫传感器。该传感器灵敏度良好、线性范围较宽，检出限低达0.2nmol/L，并有望用于实际样品中表皮生长因子的检测。式Ia式Ib。
abse: The invention discloses an electrochemical immunosensor for detecting epidermal growth factor (EGF), and a preparation method of the electrochemical immunosensor. The electrochemical immunosensor sequentially consists of a glassy carbon electrode, a modified layer a, a modified layer b and a modified layer c from bottom to top, wherein the modified layer a is a membrane formed by poly-dopamine shown in a formula Ia or formula Ib, and n is equal to 1,000-15,000 in the formula Ia and formula Ib; the modified layer b comprises the EGF and glutathione, and the EGF and the glutathione are attached to the modified layer a; the modified layer c is prepared from nano-silver sol modified by an EGF antibody. The electrochemical immunosensor for detecting the EDF can be built by the specific immune recognition reaction of the EGF and the EGF antibody. The electrochemical immunosensor is high in sensitivity and wide in linear range, has the detection limit reaching up to 0.2nmol/ L, and is expected to be applied to the detection of the EGF in an actual sample. The formula Ia and the formula Ib are described in the specification.

abso: 一种基于激光扫描仪标定线阵相机的系统，包括承载装置、激光扫描仪以及解算装置，激光扫描仪安装在承载装置上，承载装置上装设有一支架，用于固定一线阵相机，激光扫描仪位于线阵相机下方，激其激光扫描方向和线阵相机的镜头方向平行，且激光扫描仪和线阵相机的节点在同一竖直直线上，激光扫描仪扫描获取被测目标物体的点云数据，线阵相机拍摄激光扫描仪所扫描的位置以获取被测目标物的图像数据，解算装置接收点云数据和图像数据，并对接收的数据进行特征匹配，以及根据接收的数据运算线阵相机的内方位元素。本发明还提供了一种基于激光扫描仪标定线阵相机的方法，所述基于激光扫描仪标定线阵相机的系统及方法降低了标定线阵相机的工作量。
tie: System and method for calibrating linear array camera based on laser scanner
absc: 一种基于激光扫描仪标定线阵相机的系统，包括承载装置、激光扫描仪以及解算装置，激光扫描仪安装在承载装置上，承载装置上装设有一支架，用于固定一线阵相机，激光扫描仪位于线阵相机下方，激其激光扫描方向和线阵相机的镜头方向平行，且激光扫描仪和线阵相机的节点在同一竖直直线上，激光扫描仪扫描获取被测目标物体的点云数据，线阵相机拍摄激光扫描仪所扫描的位置以获取被测目标物的图像数据，解算装置接收点云数据和图像数据，并对接收的数据进行特征匹配，以及根据接收的数据运算线阵相机的内方位元素。本发明还提供了一种基于激光扫描仪标定线阵相机的方法，所述基于激光扫描仪标定线阵相机的系统及方法降低了标定线阵相机的工作量。
abse: The invention provides a system for calibrating a linear array camera based on a laser scanner, comprising a bearing device, a laser scanner and a resolver, wherein the laser scanner is arranged on the bearing device, and the bearing device is provided with a support which is used for fixing the linear array camera; the laser scanner is arranged below the linear array camera, the scanning direction of the laser scanner is parallel to the lens direction of the linear array camera, and nodes of the laser scanner and nodes of the linear array camera are in the same vertical straight line; the laser scanner scans to acquire point cloud data of a measured target object; the linear array camera takes pictures for positions scanned by the laser scanner so as to acquire image data of the measured target object; and the resolver receives the point cloud data and the image data, carries out characteristic matching on the received data and operates inner orientation elements of the linear array camera in accordance with the received data. The invention also provides a method for calibrating the linear array camera based on the laser scanner. The system and method provided by the invention can be used to reduce the workload of calibrating the linear array camera.

abso: 本实用新型公开了一种间距可调的双等离子体产生高强度太赫兹波的系统，包括沿光路依序设置的激光器、光参量放大器、斩波器、爬升器、激光扩束器、空间光调制器、反射镜、BBO晶体、第一离轴抛物面反射镜、第二离轴抛物面反射镜、滤波片和硅片。本实用新型能够通过调整空间光调制器上装载的两幅菲涅尔透镜相位图之间的间距和对称轴旋转角度，进而控制双等离子体之间的间距和空间分布，不仅提高了太赫兹波的强度，还能够精确的控制太赫兹波的能量和偏振状态，弥补了高强度太赫兹波产生技术领域的空白，具有较强的科研及实际应用价值；本实用新型的系统结构简单、建置成本低、容易维护、稳定性较高，产生的太赫兹波能量较强、光谱较宽，利于光谱测量。
tie: The system that double plasma adjustable in pitch produces high intensity THz wave
absc: 本实用新型公开了一种间距可调的双等离子体产生高强度太赫兹波的系统，包括沿光路依序设置的激光器、光参量放大器、斩波器、爬升器、激光扩束器、空间光调制器、反射镜、BBO晶体、第一离轴抛物面反射镜、第二离轴抛物面反射镜、滤波片和硅片。本实用新型能够通过调整空间光调制器上装载的两幅菲涅尔透镜相位图之间的间距和对称轴旋转角度，进而控制双等离子体之间的间距和空间分布，不仅提高了太赫兹波的强度，还能够精确的控制太赫兹波的能量和偏振状态，弥补了高强度太赫兹波产生技术领域的空白，具有较强的科研及实际应用价值；本实用新型的系统结构简单、建置成本低、容易维护、稳定性较高，产生的太赫兹波能量较强、光谱较宽，利于光谱测量。
abse: The utility model discloses the system that a kind of double plasma adjustable in pitch produces high intensity THz wave, including laser, photoparametric amplifier, chopper, climbing device, laser beam expander, spatial light modulator, speculum, bbo crystal, the first off-axis parabolic mirror, the second off-axis parabolic mirror, filter plate and the silicon chip sequentially set along light path.The utility model can be by adjusting the spacing and symmetry axis rotation angle between the two width Fresnel Lenses phase diagrams loaded in spatial light modulator, and then control the spacing and spatial distribution between double plasma, not only increase the intensity of THz wave, the energy and polarization state of THz wave can also be accurately controlled, the blank in high intensity THz wave generation technology field is compensate for, there is stronger scientific research and actual application value；The system structure of the utility model is simple, build cost low, easy maintenance, high stability, and the THz wave energy of generation is relatively strong, spectrum is wider, beneficial to spectral measurement.

abso: 一种机会网络的消息转发方法，其中尽可能地使网络中携带消息的节点均匀分布，并执行以下步骤：根据历史相遇记录得出节点平均相遇时间；综合节点移动速度计算各个节点同源节点之间的距离，再构建候选中间节点池；按照一定的筛选规则选择节点放入该节点池中，池中先到的节点作为消息转发中间结点，将消息传递给该节点；如果携带消息节点的数量小于预先设置的网络中携带消息节点数量的最大值，那么继续计算网络中其他节点到携带消息节点的距离，选择节点将消息继续传递下去，直到网络中携带信息的节点达到预设最大值最后，等待携带消息的节点同目的节点相遇，传递消息成功。
tie: Uniform distribution based opportunity network message forwarding strategy
absc: 一种机会网络的消息转发方法，其中尽可能地使网络中携带消息的节点均匀分布，并执行以下步骤：根据历史相遇记录得出节点平均相遇时间；综合节点移动速度计算各个节点同源节点之间的距离，再构建候选中间节点池；按照一定的筛选规则选择节点放入该节点池中，池中先到的节点作为消息转发中间结点，将消息传递给该节点；如果携带消息节点的数量小于预先设置的网络中携带消息节点数量的最大值，那么继续计算网络中其他节点到携带消息节点的距离，选择节点将消息继续传递下去，直到网络中携带信息的节点达到预设最大值最后，等待携带消息的节点同目的节点相遇，传递消息成功。
abse: The invention discloses a message forwarding method of an opportunity network. Nodes carrying messages in the network are distributed as uniformly as possible; and the message forwarding method of the opportunity network comprises the following step of obtaining node average meeting time based on historical meeting records; calculating a distance between each node and a source node by combining with a node moving speed and establishing a candidate intermediate node pool; selecting nodes according to a certain sieving rule and placing the nodes in the node pool, regarding the node which is firstly placed in the pool as a message forwarding intermediate node and delivering the message to the node; if the number of the nodes carrying the messages is less than a preset maximum value of the number of the nodes carrying the messages in the network, carrying on calculating the distance between each other node and the node which carries the messages in the network, selecting one node to carry on delivering the message until the number of the nodes carrying the messages in the network reaches to the preset maximum value; and finally waiting until the node carrying the messages meets a target node to deliver the messages successfully.

abso: 本公开实施例涉及一种作文离题检测方法，其包括：对作文集进行主题模型训练，得到作文的Biterm‑LDA主题模型，并对文档集进行Doc2vec模型训练，得到Doc2vec文档向量模型；将Biterm‑LDA主题模型与Doc2vec文档向量模型的文本表示进行组合，得到组合特征；对作文的组合特征基于孪生网络的多层感知机进行降维和特征优化；对降维和特征优化后的话题作文，分为切题作文和离题作文，对切题作文中的一部分构建话题类中心，并根据话题类中心对切题作文中的剩余部分和离题作文分别计算，得到针对同一话题的一组阈值；根据一组阈值利用ROC曲线进行筛选，得到最佳阈值。本公开能为不同话题作文动态计算最佳阈值。
tie: A kind of detection method that digresses from the subject of writing a composition
absc: 本公开实施例涉及一种作文离题检测方法，其包括：对作文集进行主题模型训练，得到作文的Biterm‑LDA主题模型，并对文档集进行Doc2vec模型训练，得到Doc2vec文档向量模型；将Biterm‑LDA主题模型与Doc2vec文档向量模型的文本表示进行组合，得到组合特征；对作文的组合特征基于孪生网络的多层感知机进行降维和特征优化；对降维和特征优化后的话题作文，分为切题作文和离题作文，对切题作文中的一部分构建话题类中心，并根据话题类中心对切题作文中的剩余部分和离题作文分别计算，得到针对同一话题的一组阈值；根据一组阈值利用ROC曲线进行筛选，得到最佳阈值。本公开能为不同话题作文动态计算最佳阈值。
abse: The embodiment of the present disclosure is related to a kind of detection method that digresses from the subject of writing a composition comprising: topic model training, the Biterm-LDA topic model write a composition are carried out to collected works are made, and Doc2vec model training is carried out to document sets, obtains Doc2vec document handling；Biterm-LDA topic model and the text representation of Doc2vec document handling are combined, assemblage characteristic is obtained；Dimensionality reduction and characteristic optimization are carried out based on the multi-layer perception (MLP) of twin network to the assemblage characteristic of composition；To the topic composition after dimensionality reduction and characteristic optimization, it is divided into keep to the point composition and the composition that digresses from the subject, to a part building topic class center in composition pertinent to the point, and the remainder in composition pertinent to the point and the composition that digresses from the subject are calculated separately according to topic class center, obtains one group of threshold value for same topic；It is screened according to one group of threshold value using ROC curve, obtains optimal threshold.The disclosure can calculate optimal threshold for different topic composition dynamics.

tie: Chalcone analogue containing 4-oxygen generation quinazoline-2-radical and preparation method and application of chalcone analogue
absc: 本发明公开了通式(I)所示的含4-氧代喹唑啉-2-基的查耳酮类似物，其中，各取代基的定义详见说明书。此外，还公开了上述化合物的制备方法。该通式(I)所示的化合物对人乳腺癌(MFC-7)、人结肠癌(HCT-116)细胞的增殖具有抑制作用，可用作抗肿瘤药物。
abse: The invention discloses a chalcone analogue containing a 4-oxygen generation quinazoline-2-radical as shown in the formula (I), wherein the definition of all substitute radicals can be found in description; besides, the invention further discloses a preparation method of the chalcone analogue. The chalcone analogue as shown in the formula (I) has an inhibition function on cell proliferation of human breast cancer (MFC-7) and human colon cancer (HCT-116) and can be used as anti-tumor medicine.

abso: 本发明公开一种表述地面沉降空间演化趋势的方法，包括以下步骤：融合永久散射体干涉测量获得的数据集与小基线干涉测量获得的数据集，获取地表形变信息；利用加权标准差椭圆方法分析地表形变信息中PS点分布的方向性，分别以平均沉降速率和各年沉降量作为权重，计算PS点空间分布的加权标准差椭圆，其中，以地表形变信息中地理要素空间分布的平均位置为椭圆中心，分别计算地理要素在X方向和Y方向上的标准差，以此定义包含地理要素分布的椭圆的轴，椭圆长轴的方向反映在二维空间上展布的主趋势方向，短轴代表在次要方向上偏离重心的程度。
tie: Method for expressing evolution trend of ground settlement space
absc: 本发明公开一种表述地面沉降空间演化趋势的方法，包括以下步骤：融合永久散射体干涉测量获得的数据集与小基线干涉测量获得的数据集，获取地表形变信息；利用加权标准差椭圆方法分析地表形变信息中PS点分布的方向性，分别以平均沉降速率和各年沉降量作为权重，计算PS点空间分布的加权标准差椭圆，其中，以地表形变信息中地理要素空间分布的平均位置为椭圆中心，分别计算地理要素在X方向和Y方向上的标准差，以此定义包含地理要素分布的椭圆的轴，椭圆长轴的方向反映在二维空间上展布的主趋势方向，短轴代表在次要方向上偏离重心的程度。
abse: The invention discloses a method for expressing the evolution trend of a ground settlement space, comprising the following steps: a data set obtained through permanent scatterer interferometry and a data set obtained through small baseline interferometry are fused to acquire surface deformation information; a weighted standard deviation ellipse method is used to analyze the directionality of PS point distribution in the surface deformation information; and the weighted standard deviation ellipse of PS point spatial distribution is calculated by respectively taking the average settlement rate and the settlement of each year as the weight, wherein the standard deviations of geographical elements in the X direction and in the Y direction are respectively calculated by taking the average position of spatial distribution of the geographical elements in the surface deformation information as the ellipse center, the ellipse axes containing geographical element distribution are thus defined, the direction of the long axis of the ellipse reflects the main trend direction of distribution in a two-dimension space, and the direction of the short axis represents the degree of deviation from the center of gravity in the secondary direction.

abso: 本发明提供一种基于GIS的海量统计数据的空间奇异点发掘方法，包括以下步骤：读取GIS数据库中已存储的空间数据集；对空间数据集中各个空间数据的分布情况进行分析，判断各个空间数据的分布情况是否符合正态分布要求，如果判断结果为是，对各个所述空间数据进行全局奇异点查找，直到符合查找结束条件时，结束流程；或，对各个所述空间数据进行局部奇异点查找，直到符合查找结束条件时，结束流程。将GIS技术与空间统计分析方法结合起来，能够从海量空间数据中快速准确的查找到空间奇异点数据。
tie: Method for detecting space singular point of mass statistical data based on GIS (Geographic Information System)
absc: 本发明提供一种基于GIS的海量统计数据的空间奇异点发掘方法，包括以下步骤：读取GIS数据库中已存储的空间数据集；对空间数据集中各个空间数据的分布情况进行分析，判断各个空间数据的分布情况是否符合正态分布要求，如果判断结果为是，对各个所述空间数据进行全局奇异点查找，直到符合查找结束条件时，结束流程；或，对各个所述空间数据进行局部奇异点查找，直到符合查找结束条件时，结束流程。将GIS技术与空间统计分析方法结合起来，能够从海量空间数据中快速准确的查找到空间奇异点数据。
abse: The invention provides a method for detecting a space singular point of mass statistical data based on a GIS (Geographic Information System). The method comprises the following steps: reading a space data set stored in a GIS database; analyzing the distribution condition of the space data in the space data set and judging if the distribution condition of the space data meets a normal distribution demand, and if yes, performing global singular point detection on the space data and ending the process till meeting a detection ending condition; or performing local singular point detection on the space data and ending the process till meeting the detection ending condition. The GIS technique is combined with a space statistic analysis method, so that the space singular point data can be quickly and accurately detected in the mass space data.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于对比度和结构相似度的图像增强方法，包括步骤：输入原始单幅雾霾图像；通过迭代的四叉树分割实现对大气光的鲁棒估计；采用基于内容的超像素分割技术将图像分割成局部区域块；构造代价函数，对各个局部区域块的大气传播图进行估计，得到各块最优传输参数；利用大气退化模型进行图像恢复。本发明提供的去雾方法有效提高复原场景图像可见度，具有运算速度快、图像恢复效果较好等优点，适用于实时性要求高的系统。
tie: Image enhancement method based on contrast and structural similarity
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于对比度和结构相似度的图像增强方法，包括步骤：输入原始单幅雾霾图像；通过迭代的四叉树分割实现对大气光的鲁棒估计；采用基于内容的超像素分割技术将图像分割成局部区域块；构造代价函数，对各个局部区域块的大气传播图进行估计，得到各块最优传输参数；利用大气退化模型进行图像恢复。本发明提供的去雾方法有效提高复原场景图像可见度，具有运算速度快、图像恢复效果较好等优点，适用于实时性要求高的系统。
abse: The invention discloses an image enhancement method based on contrast and structural similarity. The method comprises steps: an original single haze image is inputted; robust estimation on atmospheric light is realized through iterative quadtree segmentation; content-based superpixel segmentation technology is adopted for segmenting the image into local area blocks; a cost function is built, an atmospheric propagation chart of each local area block is estimated, and the optimal transmission parameter for each block is obtained; and an atmospheric degradation model is used for image restoration. The de-haze method provided by the invention can effectively improve visibility of a recovery scene image, has the advantages of fast operation speed and good image recovery effects, and can be applied to a system with high real-time performance requirements.

abso: 本发明提供了一种倒置显微镜下拍摄的植物叶片照片的气孔识别方法及装置，方法包括：将倒置显微镜下拍摄的叶片照片作为输入原图；利用VGG16卷积神经网络模型对叶片照片进行卷积处理，得到包含叶片气孔特征的第一特征矩阵；将其中每一特征点为中心点映射回原图，以映射回原图上的此点为中心点得到不同大小的区域；根据第一特征矩阵上每一个特征点及相邻特征点进行第一预设行列全卷积处理，判断映射回原图上的区域是否为感兴趣的目标区域以及目标区域的范围；将原图上的目标区域映射回第一特征矩阵，得到对应的第二特征矩阵；用预设的全连接神经网络确定第二特征矩阵是否为气孔区域以及气孔区域的范围。这样，可以减少科研人员的操作，提高科研的速度和效率。
tie: A kind of stomata recognition methods of plant leaf blade photo and device
absc: 本发明提供了一种倒置显微镜下拍摄的植物叶片照片的气孔识别方法及装置，方法包括：将倒置显微镜下拍摄的叶片照片作为输入原图；利用VGG16卷积神经网络模型对叶片照片进行卷积处理，得到包含叶片气孔特征的第一特征矩阵；将其中每一特征点为中心点映射回原图，以映射回原图上的此点为中心点得到不同大小的区域；根据第一特征矩阵上每一个特征点及相邻特征点进行第一预设行列全卷积处理，判断映射回原图上的区域是否为感兴趣的目标区域以及目标区域的范围；将原图上的目标区域映射回第一特征矩阵，得到对应的第二特征矩阵；用预设的全连接神经网络确定第二特征矩阵是否为气孔区域以及气孔区域的范围。这样，可以减少科研人员的操作，提高科研的速度和效率。
abse: The invention provides a kind of stomata recognition methods of the plant leaf blade photo shot under inverted microscope and device, method to include：Using the blade photo shot under inverted microscope as input artwork；Process of convolution is carried out to blade photo using VGG16 convolutional neural networks model, obtains including the fisrt feature matrix of intensities in leaves；Point centered on each of which characteristic point is mapped back into artwork, point obtains different size of region centered on mapping back this point in artwork；The first full process of convolution of default ranks is carried out according to each characteristic point on fisrt feature matrix and adjacent feature point, judge to map back the region in artwork whether be target area interested and target area scope；Target area in artwork is mapped back into fisrt feature matrix, obtains corresponding second characteristic matrix；With default full Connection Neural Network determine second characteristic matrix whether be hole area and hole area scope.So, it is possible to reduce the operation of scientific research personnel, improve the speed and efficiency of scientific research.

abso: 本发明公开一种金‑二氧化钛复合纳米管阵列与金纳米管阵列电极的制备方法，包括如下步骤：(1)准备矩形钛金属片；(2)电解；(3)淬火；(4)制作电极；(5)电镀；(6)清洗；(7)重复步骤(5)和步骤(6)；(8)使用氢氟酸浸润滤纸，将电镀后的电极置于滤纸之上；(9)重复步骤(5)和步骤(6)。本发明能够制备出形貌、管径、壁厚可控的高度有序的Au/Au‑TiO2纳米管阵列电极材料。
tie: A kind of preparation method of metal/titanic oxide composite nano tube array and gold nanotubes array electrode
absc: 本发明公开一种金‑二氧化钛复合纳米管阵列与金纳米管阵列电极的制备方法，包括如下步骤：(1)准备矩形钛金属片；(2)电解；(3)淬火；(4)制作电极；(5)电镀；(6)清洗；(7)重复步骤(5)和步骤(6)；(8)使用氢氟酸浸润滤纸，将电镀后的电极置于滤纸之上；(9)重复步骤(5)和步骤(6)。本发明能够制备出形貌、管径、壁厚可控的高度有序的Au/Au‑TiO2纳米管阵列电极材料。
abse: The present invention discloses the preparation method of a kind of metal/titanic oxide composite nano tube array and gold nanotubes array electrode, comprises the following steps：(1) rectangle titanium metal plate is prepared；(2) it is electrolysed；(3) quench；(4) electrode is made；(5) electroplate；(6) clean；(7) repeat step (5) and step (6)；(8) filter paper is infiltrated using hydrofluoric acid, the electrode after plating is placed on filter paper；(9) repeat step (5) and step (6).The present invention can prepare the Au/Au TiO2 nanometer pipe array electrode materials of the controllable high-sequential of pattern, caliber, wall thickness.

abso: 本发明公开四硫富瓦烯类化合物及其合成方法，包括如下步骤：(1)合成4,5‑二氯邻苯二甲酸酐；(2)合成5,6‑二氯‑2‑环己基异吲哚‑1,3‑二酮；(3)合成5,6‑二苄甲硫基‑2‑环己基异吲哚‑1,3‑二酮；(4)合成6‑环己基‑5H‑[1,3]双硫[4,5‑f]异吲哚‑2,5,7(6H)‑三酮；(5)合成6,6’‑二环己基‑5H,5’H‑[2,2’‑双[1,3]二硫[4,5‑f]异亚吲哚基]‑5,5’,7,7’(6H,6H’)四酮。
tie: Tetrathiafulvalene class compound and its synthetic method
absc: 本发明公开四硫富瓦烯类化合物及其合成方法，包括如下步骤：(1)合成4,5‑二氯邻苯二甲酸酐；(2)合成5,6‑二氯‑2‑环己基异吲哚‑1,3‑二酮；(3)合成5,6‑二苄甲硫基‑2‑环己基异吲哚‑1,3‑二酮；(4)合成6‑环己基‑5H‑[1,3]双硫[4,5‑f]异吲哚‑2,5,7(6H)‑三酮；(5)合成6,6’‑二环己基‑5H,5’H‑[2,2’‑双[1,3]二硫[4,5‑f]异亚吲哚基]‑5,5’,7,7’(6H,6H’)四酮。
abse: The present invention discloses tetrathiafulvalene class compound and its synthetic method, comprises the following steps：(1) 4,5 2 chloro-phthalic anhydrides are synthesized；(2) diketone of 5,6 dichloro, 2 cyclohexyl iso-indoles 1,3 is synthesized；(3) diketone of 5,6 dibenzyl methyl mercapto, 2 cyclohexyl iso-indoles 1,3 is synthesized；(4) 6 cyclohexyl 5H [1,3] double sulphur [4,5 f] iso-indoles 2,5,7 (6H) triketones are synthesized；(5) 6,6 ' dicyclohexyl 5H, 5 ' H [2,2 ' the different sub- indyl of double [1,3] two sulphur [4,5 f]] 5,5 ', 7,7 ' (6H, 6H ') tetrone is synthesized.

abso: 本发明提供一种纺纱机穿线方法及装置。所述方法应用于纺纱机。所述方法包括：获取纺纱机的钢筘的初始待检测图像，并对初始待检测图像进行图像处理得到待检测图像，及在图像处理过程中检测钢筘待进给齿隙中的纱线状态及相邻的已进给齿隙中的纱线状态；计算待检测图像与预先存储的标定图像之间的重叠度，并将重叠度与预设重叠度范围进行比较；当待进给齿隙中无纱线、已进给齿隙中有纱线，且重叠度在预设重叠度范围内时，直接进行穿线。由此，利用图像检测准确定位钢筘的进给位置，实现准确穿线，避免在不能准确定位钢筘的进给位置导致穿线错误时必须人工干预的情况，从而减少工作人员的工作量，提升生产效率。
tie: Spinning machine threading method and device
absc: 本发明提供一种纺纱机穿线方法及装置。所述方法应用于纺纱机。所述方法包括：获取纺纱机的钢筘的初始待检测图像，并对初始待检测图像进行图像处理得到待检测图像，及在图像处理过程中检测钢筘待进给齿隙中的纱线状态及相邻的已进给齿隙中的纱线状态；计算待检测图像与预先存储的标定图像之间的重叠度，并将重叠度与预设重叠度范围进行比较；当待进给齿隙中无纱线、已进给齿隙中有纱线，且重叠度在预设重叠度范围内时，直接进行穿线。由此，利用图像检测准确定位钢筘的进给位置，实现准确穿线，避免在不能准确定位钢筘的进给位置导致穿线错误时必须人工干预的情况，从而减少工作人员的工作量，提升生产效率。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of spinning machine threading method and device.The method is applied to spinning machine.The described method includes: obtaining initial image to be detected of the reed of spinning machine, and image procossing is carried out to initial image to be detected and obtains image to be detected, and detects yarn conditions and the adjacent yarn conditions fed in backlash in reed backlash to be fed during image processing；The degree of overlapping between image to be detected and pre-stored uncalibrated image is calculated, and degree of overlapping is compared with default degree of overlapping range；When wait feed in backlash without yarn, fed and have yarn in backlash, and when degree of overlapping is within the scope of default degree of overlapping, directly threaded.The case where utilizing image detection that the supplying position of reed is accurately positioned as a result, realizing accurate threading, avoid the necessary manual intervention when the supplying position that reed cannot be accurately positioned leads to thread mistake, to reduce the workload of staff, improving production efficiency.
tio: 纺纱机穿线方法及装置

abso: 本实用新型公开一种轨道里程测量装置，包括架体，所述架体两侧均设置有至少两个轨检轮，且所述架体两侧均至少有一个所述轨检轮内置有里程计，所述架体一侧的所述轨检轮与一条轨道的顶部和内侧紧密贴合，所述架体另一侧的所述轨检轮的轮面与另一条轨道的顶部和内侧紧密贴合。本实用新型轨道里程测量装置通过在左右轨检轮中分别安装里程计，能够使两个里程计的相互校正，确保数据更可靠，还可以在后期的数据处理中取两个里程计数据的平均值，大大提高了轨道里程的测量精度。
tie: A kind of trackage measurement apparatus
absc: 本实用新型公开一种轨道里程测量装置，包括架体，所述架体两侧均设置有至少两个轨检轮，且所述架体两侧均至少有一个所述轨检轮内置有里程计，所述架体一侧的所述轨检轮与一条轨道的顶部和内侧紧密贴合，所述架体另一侧的所述轨检轮的轮面与另一条轨道的顶部和内侧紧密贴合。本实用新型轨道里程测量装置通过在左右轨检轮中分别安装里程计，能够使两个里程计的相互校正，确保数据更可靠，还可以在后期的数据处理中取两个里程计数据的平均值，大大提高了轨道里程的测量精度。
abse: The utility model discloses a kind of trackage measurement apparatus, including support body, the support body both sides are provided with least two rails inspection wheel, and the support body both sides at least one described rail inspection wheel is built-in with odometer, rail inspection wheel and the top of track and inner side of the support body side are brought into close contact, and the wheel face that the rail inspection of the support body opposite side is taken turns is brought into close contact with the top of another track and inner side.The utility model trackage measurement apparatus by installing odometer respectively in left and right rail inspection wheel, the mutual correction of two odometers can be made, ensure that data are more reliable, the average value that two mileages count can also be taken in the Data processing in later stage, substantially increase the measurement accuracy of trackage.

abso: 本发明涉及一种交叉偏振转换光学器件及其设计方法，该设计方法包括：固定介质层与“C”结构金属层的各参数不变，根据法珀共振理论计算金属光栅层的光栅周期与光栅宽度；固定金属光栅层与“C”结构金属层的各参数不变，根据法珀共振理论计算介质层的厚度；固定金属光栅层和介质层的各参数不变，根据法珀共振理论计算“C”结构单元的外半径、内半径、起始角度和终止角度；调节“C”结构单元的外半径、内半径、起始角度或终止角度，各为多个不同值时，选择一组具有离散相位的“C”结构单元；利用一组具有离散相位的“C”结构单元，设计“C”结构金属层的二维阵列；由金属光栅层、介质层和“C”结构金属层组成交叉偏振转换光学器件，用于将入射的x偏振光转换成y偏振光。
tie: Cross polarization conversion optical device and design method thereof
absc: 本发明涉及一种交叉偏振转换光学器件及其设计方法，该设计方法包括：固定介质层与“C”结构金属层的各参数不变，根据法珀共振理论计算金属光栅层的光栅周期与光栅宽度；固定金属光栅层与“C”结构金属层的各参数不变，根据法珀共振理论计算介质层的厚度；固定金属光栅层和介质层的各参数不变，根据法珀共振理论计算“C”结构单元的外半径、内半径、起始角度和终止角度；调节“C”结构单元的外半径、内半径、起始角度或终止角度，各为多个不同值时，选择一组具有离散相位的“C”结构单元；利用一组具有离散相位的“C”结构单元，设计“C”结构金属层的二维阵列；由金属光栅层、介质层和“C”结构金属层组成交叉偏振转换光学器件，用于将入射的x偏振光转换成y偏振光。
abse: The invention relates to a cross polarization conversion optical device and a design method thereof, wherein the design method comprises the following steps: all parameters of the fixed dielectric layer and the C-structure metal layer are unchanged, and the grating period and the grating width of the metal grating layer are calculated according to the Fabry-Perot resonance theory; the parameters of the fixed metal grating layer and the C-structure metal layer are unchanged, and the thickness of the dielectric layer is calculated according to the Fabry-Perot resonance theory; fixing all parameters of the metal grating layer and the dielectric layer to be unchanged, and calculating the outer radius, the inner radius, the starting angle and the ending angle of the C-shaped structural unit according to the Fabry-Perot resonance theory; adjusting the outer radius, the inner radius, the starting angle or the ending angle of the C structural unit, and selecting a group of C structural units with discrete phases when the values are different; designing a two-dimensional array of a C-structure metal layer by utilizing a group of C-structure units with discrete phases; the cross polarization conversion optical device is composed of a metal grating layer, a dielectric layer and a C-structure metal layer and is used for converting incident x-polarized light into y-polarized light.

abso: 本发明提供了一类丙氨酸铜配合物及其制备方法和应用，是由丙氨酸与铜离子配位，还可含有其它有机小分子配体。本发明配合物的制备方法，是将丙氨酸与铜盐、碱以及其它小分子有机配体在溶剂中搅拌反应，得到所述配合物。本发明配合物合成原料易得，成本低，产品以晶体形式析出，纯度大，产率高；而且，该配合物在自然状态下能稳定存在，并具有良好的水溶性和脂溶性；另外，本发明配合物对肺癌、胃癌、肝癌、结肠腺、白血病、鼻咽癌等多种癌症细胞均呈现出优良的抑制作用，作用谱广，应用范围广泛。
tie: Alanine copper complex as well as preparation method and application thereof
absc: 本发明提供了一类丙氨酸铜配合物及其制备方法和应用，是由丙氨酸与铜离子配位，还可含有其它有机小分子配体。本发明配合物的制备方法，是将丙氨酸与铜盐、碱以及其它小分子有机配体在溶剂中搅拌反应，得到所述配合物。本发明配合物合成原料易得，成本低，产品以晶体形式析出，纯度大，产率高；而且，该配合物在自然状态下能稳定存在，并具有良好的水溶性和脂溶性；另外，本发明配合物对肺癌、胃癌、肝癌、结肠腺、白血病、鼻咽癌等多种癌症细胞均呈现出优良的抑制作用，作用谱广，应用范围广泛。
abse: The invention provides an alanine copper complex as well as a preparation method and an application thereof. The alanine copper complex has coordination of lactamine and copper ions and can also contain other organic micro-molecular ligands. The preparation method of the alanine copper complex comprises the following steps of: putting lactamine, a cupric salt, alkali and other organic micro-molecular ligands into a solvent, and stirring for reaction to obtain the alanine copper complex. The alanine copper complex is easily available in synthetic raw material and low in cost, and the product is separated out in the form of crystal and is high in purity and yield; the alanine copper complex can stably exist in a natural state and has high water solubility and fat solubility; and moreover, the alanine copper complex has a good function of inhibiting a variety of cancer cells such as cells of lung cancer, stomach cancer, liver cancer, colonic gland, leukemia, nasopharyngeal darcinoma and the like, and is wide in action spectrum and application range.

abso: 本发明提供了一种用于学习者自适应学习的问答方法及装置，其中，该方法包括：首先，获取学习者输入的查询信息；对查询信息进行关键词提取，并在预先建立的知识本体库中，根据提取到的关键词检索相应的多条学习内容；然后，利用基于语料库的相似度算法与基于距离的相似度算法相结合的方式，逐一计算查询信息与检索到的多条学习内容间的相似度，并提取相似度大于预设阈值的学习内容；最后，在提取出的学习内容中，采用自适应算法抽取与学习者对应的用户模型相匹配的自适应学习内容。本发明实施例通过在预先建立的知识本体库中查找与学习者用户模型相匹配的自适应学习内容，推荐的学习内容具有针对性，有助于学习者自主学习。
tie: A kind of answering method and device for learner's adaptive learning
absc: 本发明提供了一种用于学习者自适应学习的问答方法及装置，其中，该方法包括：首先，获取学习者输入的查询信息；对查询信息进行关键词提取，并在预先建立的知识本体库中，根据提取到的关键词检索相应的多条学习内容；然后，利用基于语料库的相似度算法与基于距离的相似度算法相结合的方式，逐一计算查询信息与检索到的多条学习内容间的相似度，并提取相似度大于预设阈值的学习内容；最后，在提取出的学习内容中，采用自适应算法抽取与学习者对应的用户模型相匹配的自适应学习内容。本发明实施例通过在预先建立的知识本体库中查找与学习者用户模型相匹配的自适应学习内容，推荐的学习内容具有针对性，有助于学习者自主学习。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of answering methods and device for learner's adaptive learning, wherein this method comprises: firstly, obtaining the query information of learner's input；Keyword extraction is carried out to query information, and in the ontologies library pre-established, according to the keyword retrieval extracted a plurality of learning Content accordingly；Then, by the similarity algorithm based on corpus combined with the similarity algorithm based on distance in the way of, calculate the similarity between query information and a plurality of learning Content retrieved one by one, and extract the learning Content that similarity is greater than preset threshold；Finally, extracting the adaptive learning content that user model corresponding with learner matches using adaptive algorithm in the learning Content extracted.The embodiment of the present invention has specific aim by searching the adaptive learning content to match with learner's user model, the learning Content of recommendation in the ontologies library pre-established, facilitates learners' corpora study.

abso: 本发明涉及一种利用THz-TDS结合化学计量学鉴定中草药的方法，主要包括如下步骤：利用THz-TDS对中草药样品进行检测，得到太赫兹时域光谱，并经傅里叶变换和Timothy和Duvillaret法计算后，得到吸收系数谱，并将所述吸收系数谱划分为训练集样本和验证集样本吸收系数谱；采用正交信号校正方法对所述训练集样本和所述验证集样本吸收系数谱进行预处理；所述训练集样本和验证集样本吸收系数谱采用最小二乘支持向量机方法建立定性分析模型，以对中草药样品进行鉴定。本发明方法简便、无污染，能够快速准确地对中草药进行无损鉴别，适用于中草药生产过程中的质量控制，其鉴定正确率可达97.84±1.62%。
tie: Method for identifying Chinese herbal medicines by using THz-TDS combined with chemometrics
absc: 本发明涉及一种利用THz-TDS结合化学计量学鉴定中草药的方法，主要包括如下步骤：利用THz-TDS对中草药样品进行检测，得到太赫兹时域光谱，并经傅里叶变换和Timothy和Duvillaret法计算后，得到吸收系数谱，并将所述吸收系数谱划分为训练集样本和验证集样本吸收系数谱；采用正交信号校正方法对所述训练集样本和所述验证集样本吸收系数谱进行预处理；所述训练集样本和验证集样本吸收系数谱采用最小二乘支持向量机方法建立定性分析模型，以对中草药样品进行鉴定。本发明方法简便、无污染，能够快速准确地对中草药进行无损鉴别，适用于中草药生产过程中的质量控制，其鉴定正确率可达97.84±1.62%。
abse: The invention relates to a method for identifying Chinese herbal medicines by using THz-TDS combined with chemometrics, which mainly comprises the following steps: carrying out detection on a Chinese herbal medicine sample by using the THz-TDS so as to obtain a terahertz time domain spectroscopy, and after the terahertz time domain spectroscopy is subjected to Fourier transform and calculated by using Timothy and Duvillaret methods, obtaining an absorption coefficient spectrum, and dividing the absorption coefficient spectrum into a training-set sample and a validating-set sample absorption coefficient spectrum; carrying out preprocessing on the training-set sample and the validating-set sample absorption coefficient spectrum by using an orthogonal signal correction method; establishing a qualitative analysis model by using the least squares support vector machine (SVM) method according to the training-set sample and the validating-set sample absorption coefficient spectrum so as to carry out identification on the Chinese herbal medicine sample. The method disclosed by the invention is simple, pollution-free, capable of rapidly and accurately carrying out nondestructive identification on the Chinese herbal medicines, and applicable to the quality control in the process of Chinese herbal medicine production, and the identification accuracy of the method can reach 97.84+ /-1.62%.

absc: 本发明公开了通式(I)所示的N-取代的吲哚啉-2-酮-3-肼基二硫代甲酸酯，其中，各取代基的定义详见说明书。此外，还公开了上述化合物的制备方法、其药用组合物。该通式(I)所示的化合物对人乳腺癌(MFC-7)、人结肠癌(HCT-116)细胞的增殖具有抑制作用，可用作抗肿瘤药物。
abse: The invention discloses N-substituted indoline-2-keto-3-hydrazine disulfide formate shown in the general formula (I), and substituents are specially defined in the specification. In addition, the invention also discloses a preparation method and a pharmaceutical composition of the compound, and the compound shown in the general formula (I) can inhibit the proliferation of human breast cancer (MFC 7) and human colon cancer (HCT 116) cells, and can be used as antitumor drugs.

abso: 一种手持便携式电导率仪，包括外壳、显示器、控制按钮、电极和照明灯泡，其中外壳由整体无缝的盒体和盖体组成，且盒体与盖体盖合后无缝隙。顶端连接有电极，上部设有显示屏，中部设置有控制按钮，下部为手持部位。外壳盖体的上部与显示屏对应部位为透明罩，与控制按钮对应的是硅胶按键套，且按键部位具有多个凸起对应与控制按钮的按键。盒体的背部设置有卡扣，手持部位下端设有放置备用电极的凹槽。照明灯泡内置于外壳内部，且具有嵌于外壳的透明的灯罩，照明灯泡的开关设在盒体的侧面。本实用新型具有体积小，便于携带，结构简单，防水防震；可以照明，电极方便更换，适用范围广；操作方便，不易滑落等优点。

abso: 本发明提出一种超复数加密域的彩色人脸识别方法，包括以下步骤：使用二维Logistic调节的正弦映射生成双随机相位掩膜；将待识别彩色人脸图像表示为纯四元矩阵，并根据双随机相位掩膜和四元数傅里叶变换进行加密；提取密文数据的实部分量和虚部分量，并结合稀疏矩阵得到稀疏的密文分量，根据密文分量得到稀疏的密文并对其进行解密；根据解密得到的不可见彩色人脸图像构建四元数最小平均相关能量均值滤波器；将待识别彩色人脸图像与滤波器的乘积进行四元数傅里叶反变换，并计算峰值旁瓣比PSR值，将最大PSR值对应的滤波器的类别作为待识别彩色人脸的类别。本发明可以有效提高识别精度，而且可以隐藏人脸图像的内容，具有较高的安全性。
tie: Color human face recognition method for hypercomplex encryption domain
absc: 本发明提出一种超复数加密域的彩色人脸识别方法，包括以下步骤：使用二维Logistic调节的正弦映射生成双随机相位掩膜；将待识别彩色人脸图像表示为纯四元矩阵，并根据双随机相位掩膜和四元数傅里叶变换进行加密；提取密文数据的实部分量和虚部分量，并结合稀疏矩阵得到稀疏的密文分量，根据密文分量得到稀疏的密文并对其进行解密；根据解密得到的不可见彩色人脸图像构建四元数最小平均相关能量均值滤波器；将待识别彩色人脸图像与滤波器的乘积进行四元数傅里叶反变换，并计算峰值旁瓣比PSR值，将最大PSR值对应的滤波器的类别作为待识别彩色人脸的类别。本发明可以有效提高识别精度，而且可以隐藏人脸图像的内容，具有较高的安全性。
abse: The invention provides a color human face recognition method for a hypercomplex encryption domain. The method comprises the following steps: sine mapping with two-dimensional Logistic regulation is used for generating a double-random phase mask; a to-be-recognized color human face image is expressed as a pure quaternary matrix, and encryption is carried out according to the double-random phase mask and quaternion Fourier transform; real and imaginary components of ciphertext data are extracted, a sparse matrix is combined to obtain a sparse ciphertext component, and a sparse ciphertext is obtained according to the ciphertext component and decrypted; according to an invisible color human face image obtained through decryption, a quaternion minimum average correlation energy mean filter is built; and the product of the to-be-recognized color human face image and the filter is subjected to quaternion Fourier inverse transform, a peak-to-sidelobe ratio (PSR) value is calculated, and the category of the filter corresponding to the maximum PSR value serves as the category of the to-be-recognized color human face. The recognition precision can be effectively improved, the content of the human face image can be hidden, and the safety is high.

abso: 本发明涉及一种溢出优化的寄存器分配方法及系统，寄存器分配方法面向MLC STT‑RAM，MLC STT‑RAM具有四种写转换状态，包括以下步骤：根据变量的生命期构造冲突图；连续地从冲突图中将度小于或等于颜色数量的变量删除，并将该变量压入堆栈中，直到所有变量的度都大于颜色数量或者冲突图成为空图；对于冲突图成为空图的情况，将所有的变量按照与变量被删除的顺序相反的顺序进行着色；对于所有变量的度都大于颜色数量的情况，根据MLC STT‑RAM中各变量的写转换频率选择潜在溢出变量；对所有变量的度都大于颜色数量的图中的所有变量进行着色。本发明能够降低能源消耗和访问延迟，并能够提高寄存器的使用寿命。
tie: A kind of register allocation method and system for overflowing optimization
absc: 本发明涉及一种溢出优化的寄存器分配方法及系统，寄存器分配方法面向MLC STT‑RAM，MLC STT‑RAM具有四种写转换状态，包括以下步骤：根据变量的生命期构造冲突图；连续地从冲突图中将度小于或等于颜色数量的变量删除，并将该变量压入堆栈中，直到所有变量的度都大于颜色数量或者冲突图成为空图；对于冲突图成为空图的情况，将所有的变量按照与变量被删除的顺序相反的顺序进行着色；对于所有变量的度都大于颜色数量的情况，根据MLC STT‑RAM中各变量的写转换频率选择潜在溢出变量；对所有变量的度都大于颜色数量的图中的所有变量进行着色。本发明能够降低能源消耗和访问延迟，并能够提高寄存器的使用寿命。
abse: The present invention relates to a kind of register allocation method and system for overflowing optimization, register allocation method has four kinds towards MLC STT RAM, MLC STT RAM and writes transition status, comprises the following steps：Conflict graph is constructed according to the lifetime of variable；The variable deletion for being less than or equal to number of colors will be continuously spent from conflict graph, and the variable is pressed into storehouse, turns into empty graph until the degree of all variables is both greater than number of colors or conflict graph；In the case of conflict graph turns into empty graph, all variables are coloured according to the opposite order of the order being deleted with variable；In the case of the degree of all variables is both greater than number of colors, potential spilling variable is selected according to the conversion frequency of writing of each variable in MLC STT RAM；All variables being both greater than to the degree of all variables in the figure of number of colors colour.The present invention can reduce energy resource consumption and access delay, and can improve the service life of register.

abso: 本发明涉及一种非易失性处理器中基于维持态的能量分配方法及系统，能量分配方法包括：根据系统掉电后电容内存储的可用能量构建能量分配模型；根据环境能量的采样数据获得系统能量恢复时间；依据可用能量计算得到从能量中断点到指令能够执行的最远点的路径；筛选路径中继续执行能量和备份能量之和小于系统电容内存储的可用能量的节点，作为可用备份点，并根据能量分配模型计算得到维持时间和继续执行时间；将维持时间和继续执行时间之和与系统能量恢复时间进行比较，如果大于则进行数据维持；如果小于则计算可用备份点在进行数据维持的情况下的收益和不维持直接备份的情况下的收益，并进行比较，根据比较结果确定进行数据维持或数据备份。
tie: Method and system for maintaining state-based energy distribution in a non-volatile processor
absc: 本发明涉及一种非易失性处理器中基于维持态的能量分配方法及系统，能量分配方法包括：根据系统掉电后电容内存储的可用能量构建能量分配模型；根据环境能量的采样数据获得系统能量恢复时间；依据可用能量计算得到从能量中断点到指令能够执行的最远点的路径；筛选路径中继续执行能量和备份能量之和小于系统电容内存储的可用能量的节点，作为可用备份点，并根据能量分配模型计算得到维持时间和继续执行时间；将维持时间和继续执行时间之和与系统能量恢复时间进行比较，如果大于则进行数据维持；如果小于则计算可用备份点在进行数据维持的情况下的收益和不维持直接备份的情况下的收益，并进行比较，根据比较结果确定进行数据维持或数据备份。
abse: The invention relates to a method and a system for energy distribution based on a maintenance state in a nonvolatile processor, wherein the energy distribution method comprises the following steps: constructing an energy distribution model according to available energy stored in a capacitor after the system is powered down; acquiring system energy recovery time according to the sampling data of the environment energy; calculating a path from the energy interrupt point to the farthest point at which the instruction can be executed according to the available energy; nodes in the screening path, of which the sum of the continued execution energy and the backup energy is smaller than the available energy stored in the system capacitor, are used as available backup points, and the maintenance time and the continued execution time are calculated according to the energy distribution model; comparing the sum of the maintaining time and the continuous execution time with the system energy recovery time, and if the sum is greater than the system energy recovery time, maintaining data; if the calculated profit is less than the calculated profit, the profit of the available backup point under the condition of data maintenance and the profit under the condition of not maintaining direct backup are compared, and the data maintenance or the data backup is determined according to the comparison result.

abso: 本实用新型涉及一种测距移动滑台，包括架座、丝杆、移动滑台、驱动装置、标尺及挡板；所述移动滑台设置在所述架座上方，所述丝杆通过丝杆螺母与所述移动滑台传动连接；所述驱动装置设置在所述丝杆的一端，所述挡板设置在所述丝杆的另一端；所述标尺设置在所述架座的一侧；所述架座两侧均设置有侧板，所述丝杆的两端通过轴承分别固定在所述侧板上；本实用新型解决了现有测距传感器检测存在的检测装置结构复杂、误差较大、无法检验测距精度的缺陷，本实用新型结构简单，成本低，能够控制误差来源，精确的校验测距传感器的测距距离精度，适用于各种小型的检测实验。

abse: The utility model relates to a distance measuring moving sliding table, which comprises a frame seat, a screw rod, a moving sliding table, a driving device, a scale and a baffle plate; the movable sliding table is arranged above the frame seat, and the screw rod is in transmission connection with the movable sliding table through a screw rod nut; the driving device is arranged at one end of the screw rod, and the baffle is arranged at the other end of the screw rod; the scale is arranged on one side of the frame seat; side plates are arranged on two sides of the frame seat, and two ends of the screw rod are respectively fixed on the side plates through bearings; the utility model provides a current range finding sensor detect the detection device structure that exists complicated, the error is great, can't inspect the defect of range finding precision, the utility model discloses simple structure, it is with low costs, can control the error source, accurate check-up range finding sensor's range finding distance precision is applicable to various miniature detection experiments.

abso: 本发明涉及一种空气等离子体产生太赫兹波的调制方法。该方法包括：包括：步骤一、设计透镜相位图，透镜相位图是透镜相位因子的相位分布图；步骤二、在空气等离子体产生太赫兹波的光路系统上加载透镜相位图，产生等离子体细丝，辐射太赫兹波；步骤一中，设计透镜相位图的步骤包括：a、调节透镜相位图的相位分布，利用空气等离子体产生太赫兹波的光路系统产生太赫兹波；b、研究产生的太赫兹波的频谱与产生的等离子体形态之间的关系；c、设定预期产生的太赫兹波的频谱，计算产生该太赫兹波的两个等离子体之间的间距；d、计算透镜相位图的等效焦距f<Sub>1</Sub>；e、设计透镜相位图。本发明实施例的方法操作简单，实现对太赫兹波频谱的动态调制，并提高了能量利用率。
tie: The spectrum modulation method and light path system of air plasma generation THz wave
absc: 本发明涉及一种空气等离子体产生太赫兹波的调制方法。该方法包括：包括：步骤一、设计透镜相位图，透镜相位图是透镜相位因子的相位分布图；步骤二、在空气等离子体产生太赫兹波的光路系统上加载透镜相位图，产生等离子体细丝，辐射太赫兹波；步骤一中，设计透镜相位图的步骤包括：a、调节透镜相位图的相位分布，利用空气等离子体产生太赫兹波的光路系统产生太赫兹波；b、研究产生的太赫兹波的频谱与产生的等离子体形态之间的关系；c、设定预期产生的太赫兹波的频谱，计算产生该太赫兹波的两个等离子体之间的间距；d、计算透镜相位图的等效焦距f<Sub>1</Sub>；e、设计透镜相位图。本发明实施例的方法操作简单，实现对太赫兹波频谱的动态调制，并提高了能量利用率。
abse: The present invention relates to the modulator approaches that a kind of air plasma generates THz wave.This method comprises: including: Step 1: design lens phase figure, lens phase figure is the phase distribution figure of the lens phase factor；Step 2: the loaded lenses phase diagram on the light path system that air plasma generates THz wave, generates plasma filament, THz wave is radiated；In step 1, design lens phase figure the step of include: a, adjust lens phase figure phase distribution, utilize air plasma generate THz wave light path system generate THz wave；B, the relationship between the frequency spectrum of THz wave that research generates and the plasma form of generation；C, the frequency spectrum of the expected THz wave generated of setting, calculates the spacing between two plasmas for generating the THz wave；D, the equivalent focal length f of lens phase figure is calculated<Sub>1</Sub>；E, lens phase figure is designed.The method of the embodiment of the present invention is easy to operate, realizes the dynamic modulation to THz wave frequency spectrum, and improve capacity usage ratio.

abso: 本发明提供一种空中手写识别方法及装置，应用于用户终端。所述方法包括：采集待识别的手势轨迹；获取待识别的手势轨迹的坐标序列，提取坐标序列的多个方向的特征集；对坐标序列的多个方向的特征集进行降维，得到降维后的预设维度的特征集；将预设维度的特征集输入至分类器，其中，分类器包括有多个子分类器；分类器计算预设维度的特征集在分类器中的各个子分类器的稀疏编码系数；根据稀疏编码系数和与稀疏编码系数对应的子分类器，得到预设维度的特征集与各个子分类器之间的重构误差；对重构误差进行排序，输出识别结果。本发明能够实现在线的空中手写识别，计算简单，识别效率高。
tie: Air handwriting identification method and device
absc: 本发明提供一种空中手写识别方法及装置，应用于用户终端。所述方法包括：采集待识别的手势轨迹；获取待识别的手势轨迹的坐标序列，提取坐标序列的多个方向的特征集；对坐标序列的多个方向的特征集进行降维，得到降维后的预设维度的特征集；将预设维度的特征集输入至分类器，其中，分类器包括有多个子分类器；分类器计算预设维度的特征集在分类器中的各个子分类器的稀疏编码系数；根据稀疏编码系数和与稀疏编码系数对应的子分类器，得到预设维度的特征集与各个子分类器之间的重构误差；对重构误差进行排序，输出识别结果。本发明能够实现在线的空中手写识别，计算简单，识别效率高。
abse: The invention provides an air handwriting identification method and device applied to a user terminal. The method comprises steps that to-be-identified gesture locus is acquired; a coordinate sequence of the to-be-identified gesture locus is acquired, and characteristic sets of the coordinate sequence in multiple directions are extracted; dimension reduction for the characteristic sets of the coordinate sequence in multiple directions is carried out to acquire preset-dimension characteristic sets after dimension reduction; the preset-dimension characteristic sets are inputted to a classifier, and the classifier comprises multiple sub classifiers; sparse coding coefficients of the preset-dimension characteristic sets in the sub classifiers of the classifier are calculated through the classifier; reconstruction errors between the preset-dimension characteristic sets and the sub classifiers are respectively acquired according to the sparse coding coefficients and the sub classifiers corresponding to the sparse coding coefficients; the reconstruction errors are orders, and an identification result is outputted. The method is advantaged in that online air handwriting identification can be realized, and simple calculation and high identification efficiency are realized.

abso: 本发明公开了一种激光激发空气等离子体产生高强度太赫兹波的系统和方法，其中，该系统包括激光器、光参量放大器、衰减片、斩波器、第一、第二和第三离轴抛物面反射镜、BBO晶体、滤波片和硅片，激光器用于发射波长为800nm的激光，800nm的激光经过光参量放大器后输出波长为1400nm的信号光及与其对应的波长为1863.95nm的闲频光，之后经过衰减片后衰减为一总功率为设定值N的光束，然后经过斩波器后由第一离轴抛物面反射镜反射至BBO晶体；经由BBO晶体射出的光束聚焦电离空气，激发空气中的等离子体并产生一太赫兹辐射源，太赫兹辐射源发射的太赫兹波经由第二、第三离轴抛物面反射镜反射收集后再依次经过滤波片和硅片滤波，即得到太赫兹能量为M的高强度太赫兹波。
tie: The system and method that laser excitation air plasma generates high intensity THz wave
absc: 本发明公开了一种激光激发空气等离子体产生高强度太赫兹波的系统和方法，其中，该系统包括激光器、光参量放大器、衰减片、斩波器、第一、第二和第三离轴抛物面反射镜、BBO晶体、滤波片和硅片，激光器用于发射波长为800nm的激光，800nm的激光经过光参量放大器后输出波长为1400nm的信号光及与其对应的波长为1863.95nm的闲频光，之后经过衰减片后衰减为一总功率为设定值N的光束，然后经过斩波器后由第一离轴抛物面反射镜反射至BBO晶体；经由BBO晶体射出的光束聚焦电离空气，激发空气中的等离子体并产生一太赫兹辐射源，太赫兹辐射源发射的太赫兹波经由第二、第三离轴抛物面反射镜反射收集后再依次经过滤波片和硅片滤波，即得到太赫兹能量为M的高强度太赫兹波。
abse: The invention discloses the system and method that a kind of laser excitation air plasma generates high intensity THz wave, wherein, the system includes laser, photoparametric amplifier, attenuator, chopper, first, second and third off-axis parabolic mirror, bbo crystal, filter plate and silicon chip, laser is for the laser that launch wavelength is 800nm, the ideler frequency light that the signal light and corresponding wavelength that the laser of 800nm output wavelength after photoparametric amplifier is 1400nm are 1863.95nm, the light beam that a general power is setting value N is decayed to after attenuator later, then bbo crystal is reflexed to by the first off-axis parabolic mirror after chopper；Ionized air is focused via the light beam that bbo crystal projects, it excites the plasma in air and generates a terahertz emission source, the THz wave of terahertz emission source transmitting is via filtered and silicon chip filter to get to the high intensity THz wave that Terahertz energy is M successively again after second, third off-axis parabolic mirror reflecting and collecting.

abso: 本发明公开了一种区域地面沉降时空预测方法，包括：S1、结合雷达影像数据，通过雷达数据处理软件获取地面沉降信息，通过现场实测GPS与水准测量数据对地面沉降数据进行精度验证，获取高精度地面沉降信息数据库；S2、通过改进的灰色模型对地面沉降进行模拟与预测；S3‑S4、通过SOM聚类算法对监测值与模拟值的比值与误差进行聚类获取马尔科夫区间并求取马尔科夫矩阵，然后通过改进的马尔科夫模型对灰色模型预测值进行改进，通过对InSAR进行大尺度地面沉降预测。本发明通过对InSAR进行大尺度的地面预测减少对人工的依赖，节约工程成本。
tie: Regional land subsidence space-time prediction method
absc: 本发明公开了一种区域地面沉降时空预测方法，包括：S1、结合雷达影像数据，通过雷达数据处理软件获取地面沉降信息，通过现场实测GPS与水准测量数据对地面沉降数据进行精度验证，获取高精度地面沉降信息数据库；S2、通过改进的灰色模型对地面沉降进行模拟与预测；S3‑S4、通过SOM聚类算法对监测值与模拟值的比值与误差进行聚类获取马尔科夫区间并求取马尔科夫矩阵，然后通过改进的马尔科夫模型对灰色模型预测值进行改进，通过对InSAR进行大尺度地面沉降预测。本发明通过对InSAR进行大尺度的地面预测减少对人工的依赖，节约工程成本。
abse: The invention discloses a regional land subsidence space-time prediction method which comprises the following steps: S1. by combing with radar image data, acquiring land subsidence information through radar data processing software, and carrying out precision verification on the land subsidence data through a field measurement GPS (global positioning system) and leveling data, thereby obtaining a high-precision land subsidence information database; S2. carrying out simulation and prediction on land subsidence by an improved grey model; and S3-S4. clustering monitor value/analog value ratio and errors by an SOM clustering algorithm to acquire a Markov interval and calculate a Markov matrix, improving the grey model predicted value through an improved Markov model, and carrying out large-scale land subsidence prediction on InSAR. The large-scale ground prediction is carried out through the InSAR, thereby reducing the dependence on manual work and saving the engineering cost.

abso: 本发明公开了一种光热转换纳米材料负载青蒿素类药物的复合材料及其制备方法与应用。它包括光热转换纳米材料负载的青蒿素类药物后形成的复合物。其制备方法，包括如下步骤：将所述光热转换纳米材料的水溶液和青蒿素类药物溶液混合后结合，使所述光热转换纳米材料负载上所述青蒿素类药物，即得到所述复合材料。本发明运用含有金属离子的光热转换纳米材料与青蒿素类药物的复合使部分降解的光热转换材料中游离的金属离子促进青蒿素类药物过氧桥键的断裂，协同青蒿素类药物发挥化学治疗的作用，可以使得抑制肿瘤生长的效果显著增强。
tie: Composite material with artemisinin drugs loaded on photo-thermal conversion nano material and preparation method and application thereof
absc: 本发明公开了一种光热转换纳米材料负载青蒿素类药物的复合材料及其制备方法与应用。它包括光热转换纳米材料负载的青蒿素类药物后形成的复合物。其制备方法，包括如下步骤：将所述光热转换纳米材料的水溶液和青蒿素类药物溶液混合后结合，使所述光热转换纳米材料负载上所述青蒿素类药物，即得到所述复合材料。本发明运用含有金属离子的光热转换纳米材料与青蒿素类药物的复合使部分降解的光热转换材料中游离的金属离子促进青蒿素类药物过氧桥键的断裂，协同青蒿素类药物发挥化学治疗的作用，可以使得抑制肿瘤生长的效果显著增强。
abse: The invention discloses a composite material of a photothermal conversion nano material loaded with artemisinin drugs, a preparation method and application thereof. The composite material comprises a composite formed by photo-thermal conversion nano material loaded artemisinin drugs. The preparation method comprises the following steps: and mixing the aqueous solution of the photothermal conversion nano material and the artemisinin medicine solution, and combining the aqueous solution and the artemisinin medicine solution to load the artemisinin medicine on the photothermal conversion nano material to obtain the composite material. The invention uses the composition of the photothermal conversion nano material containing metal ions and the artemisinin drugs to ensure that the free metal ions in the partially degraded photothermal conversion material promote the breakdown of the peroxide bridge bond of the artemisinin drugs and play a role in chemotherapy in cooperation with the artemisinin drugs, so that the effect of inhibiting the growth of tumors can be obviously enhanced.

abso: 本发明实施例提供了一种用于机器人分布式控制系统的形式建模方法及装置，方法包括：针对所述机器人分布式控制系统，根据各微体系结构模型xMAS元件的同步等式，对各xMAS元件在逻辑编程语言ACL2中形式化，得到所述机器人分布式控制系统对应的xMAS元模型；其中，所述各xMAS元件包括Arbiter及以下至少一项：Fork、Join、Switch、Merge、Queue、Sink、Source、和Function；在ACL2中对所述xMAS元模型中的组合逻辑元件和时序逻辑元件进行预设属性的验证；根据所述xMAS元模型，建立所述机器人分布式控制系统对应的xMAS网络。本发明实施例中，能够针对机器人分布式控制系统，创建对应的xMAS网络，进而可以根据xMAS网络实现对机器人分布式控制系统的全面验证。
tie: Formal modeling method and device for robot distributed control system
absc: 本发明实施例提供了一种用于机器人分布式控制系统的形式建模方法及装置，方法包括：针对所述机器人分布式控制系统，根据各微体系结构模型xMAS元件的同步等式，对各xMAS元件在逻辑编程语言ACL2中形式化，得到所述机器人分布式控制系统对应的xMAS元模型；其中，所述各xMAS元件包括Arbiter及以下至少一项：Fork、Join、Switch、Merge、Queue、Sink、Source、和Function；在ACL2中对所述xMAS元模型中的组合逻辑元件和时序逻辑元件进行预设属性的验证；根据所述xMAS元模型，建立所述机器人分布式控制系统对应的xMAS网络。本发明实施例中，能够针对机器人分布式控制系统，创建对应的xMAS网络，进而可以根据xMAS网络实现对机器人分布式控制系统的全面验证。
abse: The embodiment of the invention provides a formal modeling method and a formal modeling device for a robot distributed control system, wherein the formal modeling method comprises the following steps: aiming at the robot distributed control system, formalizing each xMAS element in a logic programming language ACL2 according to a synchronization equation of each micro-architecture model xMAS element to obtain an xMAS element model corresponding to the robot distributed control system; wherein each xMAS element comprises an Arbiter and at least one of the following: fork, Join, Switch, Merge, Queue, Sink, Source, and Function; verifying preset attributes of the combinational logic element and the sequential logic element in the xMAS meta-model in an ACL 2; and establishing an xMAS network corresponding to the robot distributed control system according to the xMAS meta-model. In the embodiment of the invention, the corresponding xMAS network can be established for the robot distributed control system, and further, the comprehensive verification of the robot distributed control system can be realized according to the xMAS network.

abso: 本实用新型属于汽车交通安全设备技术领域，尤其为一种路障目标检测装置，包括路障目标检测装置本体，所述路障目标检测装置本体上固定安装有两个圆杆，两个圆杆上共滑动安装有两个卡板，两个圆杆的外壁上位于两个卡板之间均套设有第一弹簧，两个卡板相互靠近的一侧外壁上均开设有多个圆形槽，所述圆形槽内滑动安装有连接块，所述连接块远离卡板的一端固定安装有卡块，所述路障目标检测装置本体上转动安装有圆轴。本实用新型实用性高，操作简单，通过在路障目标检测装置本体上设置两个带有多个卡块的卡板能将车载摄像头数据线的连接头夹紧，能有效避免其因汽车颠簸产生松动而导致脱落的情况。

abse: The utility model belongs to motor traffic safety equipment technical field, in particular a kind of roadblock object detecting device, including roadblock object detecting device ontology, round bar there are two being fixedly mounted on the roadblock object detecting device ontology, being slidably installed altogether on two round bars, there are two snap-gauges, the first spring is arranged between two snap-gauges on the outer wall of two round bars, multiple circular troughs are offered on two snap-gauges side outer wall close to each other, link block is slidably fitted in the circular trough, the link block is fixedly installed with fixture block far from one end of snap-gauge, circular shaft is rotatably equipped on the roadblock object detecting device ontology.The utility model practicability is high, it is easy to operate, it can be effectively avoided to lead to the case where falling off because automobile bumpiness generates loosening the connection head clamping of vehicle-mounted camera data line by the way that two snap-gauges with multiple fixture blocks are arranged on roadblock object detecting device ontology.
